Did you give your boss the contract?

dialogue.pinyin: Wǎnfàn de fāpiào nǐ liúzhe ne ma?
dialogue.en: A : Did you save the receipt from dinner?

dialogue.pinyin: Méi, wǒ bǎ tā rēng le.
dialogue.en: B : No I threw it away.

dialogue.cn: 什么！你干嘛把它扔掉啊？我需要发票。
dialogue.pinyin: Shénme! Nǐ gànmá bǎ tā rēngdiàoā? wǒ xūyào fāpiào.
dialogue.en: A : No! Why did you do that? I need those.
B : Why are they so important?

dialogue.cn: 我要把它们给我的老板。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yào bǎ tāmen gěi wǒ de lǎobǎn.
dialogue.en: A : Because I need to give them to my boss.
B : Why?

dialogue.cn: 如果我不给他发票，他就不给我发工资！ Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Rúguǒ wǒ bù gěi tā fāpiào, Tā jiù bù gěi wǒ fā gōngzī!
dialogue.en: A : If I don't give him receipts, I don't get paid! sentences.en: He wants to emigrate to America.
The laborers are all very hard working.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ bù néng chéngshí yīdiǎnr ma?
sentences.en: Can't you be more honest?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè fèn gōngzuò shì méiyǒu jiàqī de.
sentences.en: This job doesn't have any vacations.

dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ bù néng xiǎngxiàng zài Zhōngguó de míngōng de rìzi.
dialogue.en: You couldn't imagine being a construction worker in China.

dialogue.pinyin: Shì a, tāmen měi tiān gōngzuò hěn jiǔ.
dialogue.en: I know, they have to work long days.
And the work is dangerous too.
The pay is also very low.

dialogue.pinyin: Tāmen yī ge yuè néng ná duō shǎo qián ?
dialogue.en: How much do they make a month?
Three thousand RMB a month.
Ahh, that's more than I make!

sentences.cn: 我把衣服上的东西洗掉了。

sentences.pinyin: Bǎ zhè xiē yīfu fàng jìn xǐyījī lǐ.
sentences.en: machine.

sentences.pinyin: Tā shì ge yǒumíng de cáiféng.

dialogue.en: What happened to your suit.
The cat did that.
That's filthy. Is that...

dialogue.cn: 呃。。我已经洗掉大部分了。
dialogue.pinyin: E.. wǒ yǐjīng xǐdiào dàbùfēn le.
dialogue.en: I washed most of it off.

dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ zhēn yīnggāi bǎ tā náqù gānxǐ.
dialogue.en: You really need to get that dry cleaned.
Yeah. But there wasn't time.

dialogue.cn: 你不能穿这件衣服去见客户吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ bù néng chuān zhè jiàn yīfu qù jiàn kèhù ba.
dialogue.en: You can't see the client like that.
So I should go naked?

sentences.en: What website is this?
What show are you watching?

sentences.pinyin: Zhège shìpín tài yǒu yìsi le.
sentences.en: This video is really fun.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuìjìn kàn le tài duō kǒngbù diànyǐng le.

I hate ads!

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuān kàn diànshì jù ma?

dialogue.en: Check out this video.

I've only heard of Tudou.
Youku is the best known.
Tudou has more movies.

dialogue.pinyin: Duì, yōukùbǐ tǔdòu shàng diànshì jù duōduō le.

This living room is huge.
I like to live on the high floor.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ huì zū yí liàng xiǎo qìchē .

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng zū ge gōngyù zhù ma?

I don't like living in a penthouse.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen xiàwǔ qù mǎijiā jù ba.

100 square meters for 5000! Really?

dialogue.pinyin: Duì, dàn zhè shì kōng fáng.

dialogue.pinyin: ò, suǒyǐ wǒmen hái dé mǎijiā jù.

sentences.en: Your wife is pregnant?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de nǎinai qīshí suì le.

It can't be easy to raise a child!
In China, a child ticket is half the price.
Kids are all cute.
This child was born last year.
This is my husband.
My wife's gone out shopping.

sentences.pinyin: Gōngxǐ nǐ dé le ge érzi ā!

Congratulations, when is she due?
Next month.
Are you excited?

dialogue.pinyin: Duì, bǎ tā gěi yéye nǎinai jiù xíng le.

L3-021.lessonTitle: Working Your Way Through School in China

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ děi xuǎn liù mén kè cáixíng.
sentences.en: I've got to sign up for 6 courses.
Where is our classroom?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ měizhōu gōngzuò sìshí ge xiǎoshí.
sentences.en: I work 40 hours a week.
I've got to go rush to class.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ hái zài zuò jiānzhí ma?
sentences.en: Do you still work part time?

sentences.pinyin: Lǐ jiàoshòu de kè tǐng nán de.
sentences.en: Professor Li's course is very difficult.

sentences.cn: 当安排都做好了，要改变就不可能了。
sentences.pinyin: dàng ānpái dōu zuò hǎo le , yào gǎibiàn jiù bù kěnéng le .
sentences.en: to change it.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ de ānpái dōu mǎn le ba.
sentences.en: Your schedule must be full.

sentences.cn: 这个学期我选了李教授的课。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège xuéqī wǒ xuǎn le lǐ jiàoshòu de kè.
sentences.en: I signed up for professor Li's class this semester.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ shàng le jǐ mén Kè？
sentences.en: How many classes did you go to?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ dōu méi shíjiān shuìjiào le.
sentences.en: I don't even have time to sleep.

dialogue.cn: 你这个学期选了多少课？
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ zhège xuéqī xuǎn le duōshao kè?
dialogue.en: How many classes did you sign up for this semester?
Lots. Five classes.

dialogue.cn: 等等， 你不是有份兼职吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Děngděng, nǐ bù shì yǒu fèn jiānzhí ma?
dialogue.en: Wait. Don't you have a part time job?

dialogue.cn: 对，我一个星期工作三十个小时。
dialogue.pinyin: Duì, wǒ yī ge xīngqī gōngzuò sānshí ge xiǎoshí.
dialogue.en: Yeah. I work thirty hours a week.
That's a lot of work.

dialogue.cn: 没问题，我不睡觉就好了。
dialogue.pinyin: Méiwèntí, wǒ bù shuìjiào jiù hǎo le.
dialogue.en: It's no problem. I just don't sleep.

sentences.pinyin: Kànkan, zhè shì wǒ de xīn shǒujī.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi shǒujī de yùsuàn shì sānqiān.

sentences.pinyin: Nuòjīyà shì Zhōngguó zuìchàngxiāo de shǒujī.

sentences.cn: 诺基亚的手机好像没有翻盖的。
sentences.pinyin: Nuòjīyà de shǒujī hǎoxiàng méiyǒu fān gài de.
sentences.en: Nokia doesn't seem to have any clam shell style cell phones.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè kuǎn shǒujī de jiàgé shì duōshǎo?
sentences.en: What's the price of this cell phone?

sentences.cn: 我找不到我的手机充电器了。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhǎo bù dào wǒ de shǒujī chōngdiànqì le.
sentences.en: I can't find my cell phone charger.

sentences.cn: 这手机不是我喜欢的风格。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè shǒujī bù shì wǒ xǐhuān de fēnggé.
sentences.en: This cell phone isn't the style I like.
Girls are fond of lightweight phones.

sentences.cn: 这个手机的键盘太小了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège shǒujī de jiànpán tài xiǎo le.
sentences.en: The keypad of this cell phone is too small.

dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yào mǎi yī ge xīn shǒujī.
dialogue.en: I need to buy a new phone
What's your budget?
About 5,
How about the Nokia?

dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ bù xǐhuān fān gàir de.
dialogue.en: I don't like the clam shell (folding) style.
What about this Ericsson?
Its keypad is too small.
Well...what about this one?

dialogue.cn: 那个是苹果的吗？ 10. 山寨的。
dialogue.pinyin: Nà ge shì Píngguǒ de ma?
dialogue.en: Is that an iPhone? 10. B: It's a knockoff.

L3-024.lessonTitle: Time And Tickets Wait For No Chinese Man

sentences.cn: 我们今天晚上去电影院吧。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen jīntiān wǎnshang qù diànyǐngyuàn ba.
sentences.en: Let's go to the movies tonight.
The movie tickets are all sold out.

sentences.cn: 我昨天就在售票处买了两张电影票。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān jiù zài shòupiàochù mǎi le liǎng zhāng diànyǐngpiào
sentences.en: I bought two tickets yesterday at the ticket window.
When is the show time?

sentences.cn: 你有这家电影院的会员卡吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu zhè jiādiànyǐngyuàn de huì yuán kǎ ma?
sentences.en: theater?

sentences.cn: 想要看这个电影，你得提前订票。
sentences.pinyin: Xiǎng yào zhège diànyǐng, nǐ děi tíqián dìngpiào.
sentences.en: If you want to see this movie, you'll have to book a ticket in advance.
I'll go and ask at the main desk.
I get off work at six.

dialogue.en: What time does the movie start?

dialogue.pinyin: Liù diǎn yī chǎng, bā diǎn bàn yī chǎng.
dialogue.en: One show is six o’clock and another show is eight-thirty.

dialogue.pinyin: Wǒmen qù liù diǎn nā yī chǎng ba.
dialogue.en: How about the six o'clock show?

dialogue.cn: 来不及吧，我五点半下班。
dialogue.pinyin: Lái bùjí ba, wǒ wǔ diǎn bàn xiàbān.
dialogue.en: No time, I get off work at five-thirty.

dialogue.pinyin: Nā Qù bā diǎn bàn nā chǎng?
dialogue.en: Then how about the eight-thirty show?

dialogue.cn: 不行，太晚了，我晚上得工作。
dialogue.pinyin: Bù xíng, tài wǎn le, wǒ wǎnshang děi gōngzuò.
dialogue.en: That's too late. I have work to do this evening.

dialogue.cn: 那我们就一起吃晚饭好了。
dialogue.pinyin: Nā Wǒmen jiù yīqǐ chī wǎnfàn hǎo le.
dialogue.en: Let's go out to dinner then.

L3-025.lessonTitle: The Violent Nature of The Chinese Language

vocab.en: to be unable to get to sleep

sentences.cn: 我爷爷他晚上老打呼噜。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yéye tā wǎnshang lǎo dǎhūlū.
sentences.en: My grandpa always snores at night.

sentences.cn: 她们经常用枕头打来打去。
sentences.en: They always beat each other with pillows.
Do sleeping pills really work?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshang yòu shīmián le.
sentences.en: I had insomnia again last night.

sentences.cn: 我想要买一件新的睡衣。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào mǎi yī jiàn xīn de shuìyī.
sentences.en: I want to buy a new pair of pajamas.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zǎoshang liù diǎn jiù xǐng le.
sentences.en: I woke up at six this morning.

sentences.cn: 她把她男朋友推下床去。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bǎ tā nánpéngyou tuīxià chuáng qù.
sentences.en: She pushed her boyfriend out of bed.

sentences.pinyin: Bié chǎo le, wǒ dōu shuì bu zháole.
sentences.en: Stop being so loud, I can't get to sleep.
This mattress is really comfortable.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiùshì wǒ de wòshì le.
sentences.en: This is my bedroom.

dialogue.en: You're doing it again.
Doing what?

dialogue.cn: 打呼噜！吵得我都睡不着。
dialogue.pinyin: Dǎhūlū ! Chǎo dé wǒ dōu shuì bu zháo.
dialogue.en: Snoring! It's so loud I can't get to sleep.

dialogue.cn: 医生说你推我一下，我就不打了。
dialogue.pinyin: Yīshēng shuō nǐ tuī wǒ yīxià, wǒ jiù bù dǎ le.
dialogue.en: The doctor said if you just push me I'll stop.
I did push you, didn't work.
So push harder.

dialogue.cn: 你没见我都已经把你推下床了。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ méi jiàn wǒ dōu yǐjīng bǎ nǐ tuīxià chuáng le.
dialogue.en: I already pushed you out of bed!

L3-026.lessonTitle: Going on a Business Trip in China

vocab.en: to go on a business trip
to look over, to check for approval

sentences.cn: 这个工作有30%的时间是在出差.
sentences.pinyin: zhège gōngzuò yǒu bǎifēn zhī sānshí de shíjiān shì zài chūchāi .
sentences.en: For this job, thirty percent of the time is spent on business trips.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ děi xuéhuì zài héshì de chǎnghé shuō héshì de huà .
sentences.en: on appropriate occasions.

sentences.cn: 这份时间安排表很详细也很实用.
sentences.pinyin: zhè fèn shíjiān ānpái biǎo hěn xiángxì yě hěn shíyòng .
sentences.en: practical.

sentences.cn: 天气预报说下周会降温.
sentences.pinyin: tiānqì yùbào shuō xiàzhōu huì jiàngwēn .
sentences.en: The weather report says the temperature will drop next week.

sentences.cn: 这趟火车上午10点出发,晚上8点到达.
sentences.pinyin: zhè tàng huǒchē shàngwǔ shí diǎn chūfā ,wǎnshang bā diǎn dào dá
sentences.en: and arrives at eight at night.

sentences.cn: 你准备好了从下个月开始接手新的工作吗？
sentences.pinyin: nǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo le cóng xià ge yuè kāishǐ jiēshǒu xīn de gōngzuò ma ?
sentences.en: from next month on?
I don’t have other choices.

sentences.cn: 什么时候买机票最便宜?
sentences.pinyin: shénme shíhòu mǎi jīpiào zuì piányi?
sentences.en: tickets?

sentences.cn: 这个蛋糕太受欢迎, 两小时就卖完了.
sentences.pinyin: zhège dàngāo tài shòu huānyíng , liǎng xiǎoshí jiù mài wán le
sentences.en: This cake was so popular that it was sold out within two hours.

sentences.cn: 打包好你的行李, 另外, 再检查一下你的机票.
sentences.pinyin: dǎ bāo hǎo nǐ de xíngli , lìngwài , zài jiǎnchá yíxià nǐ de jīpiào.
sentences.en: Pack your luggage, besides, check your plane ticket again.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 周总,这是下周出差的时间安排表.请您过目.
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: Zhōu zǒng, zhè shì xiàzhōu chūchāi de shíjiān ānpái biǎo. qǐng nín guò mù.
dialogue.en: LIU: Mr. Zhou, this is the itinerary for the business trip next week. Please look it over.

dialogue.cn: 周: 好的. 我看看. 星期天就出发吗? 别的时间不行吗?
dialogue.pinyin: ZHŌU: hǎo de. wǒ kànkan. xīngqītiān jiù chūfā ma? biéde shíjiān bù xíng ma?
dialogue.en: ZHOU: Ok. Let me see. We're leaving on Sunday? There isn't another time that's going to work?

dialogue.cn: 刘: 别的时间的机票都卖完了, 只有这个时间合适.
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: biéde shíjiān de jīpiào dōu mài wán le, zhǐyǒu zhège shíjiān héshì.
dialogue.en: LIU: The tickets for the other times are sold out. Only this time will work.

dialogue.cn: 周: 好的, 我知道了.
dialogue.pinyin: ZHŌU: hǎo de, wǒ zhīdao le.
dialogue.en: ZHOU: Alright, I see.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 另外, 周总, 午餐已经为您准备好了.
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: lìngwài, zhōu zǒng, wǔcān yǐjīng wèi nín zhǔnbèi hǎo le.
dialogue.en: LIU: Besides, Mr. Zhou, lunch is ready for you.

dialogue.cn: 周: 就准备好了? 谢谢你.
dialogue.pinyin: ZHŌU: jiù zhǔnbèi hǎo le ? xièxie nǐ.
dialogue.en: ZHOU: Already prepared? Thank you.

to strive for; to try hard to achieve

sentences.cn: 如果天气不好就算了吧.
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ tiānqì bùhǎo jiù suànle ba.
sentences.en: it.

sentences.pinyin: xīnláide nà ge nǚhái shì Hāfó dàxué bìyè de .
sentences.en: University.
What did you have for breakfast?

sentences.cn: 我每天的早餐除了是麦片还是麦片.
sentences.pinyin: wǒ měi tiān de zǎocān chúle shì màipiàn hái shì màipiàn .
sentences.en: My breakfast every day is cereal and more cereal.

sentences.pinyin: Tā zǎo cān chī le yí gè xiāng jiāo.
sentences.en: She had a banana for her breakfast.

sentences.pinyin: jījíde miànduì kùnnan shì tā de yōudiǎn zhīyī .
sentences.en: advantages.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ shuō de jiùshì zhè jiā diàn .

Right here, it's comfortable.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ zhīdào wǒ pèi bú shàng tā , búguò wǒ hái shì xiǎng shìyīshì
sentences.en: I know that she's out of my league, but I still wanna give it a shot.

sentences.cn: 我会争取提前完成任务.
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ huì zhēngqǔ tíqián wánchéng rènwu
sentences.en: I will try hard to finish the task ahead of schedule.

sentences.pinyin: jīhuì shì gěi yǒu zhǔnbèi de rén de .
sentences.en: Opportunities are for those who prepare.

dialogue.cn: 陈: 公司新来的女同事长得真漂亮。长头发，大眼睛。
dialogue.pinyin: CHÉN: gōngsī xīnláide nǚ tóngshì zhǎng de zhēn piàoliang. cháng tóufa, dà yǎnjing.
dialogue.en: CHEN: The new girl that just came to our company, she is so pretty. She's got long hair and big eyes.

dialogue.pinyin: ZHĀO: shì jiào Zhāng Xiǎoqīng ma?
dialogue.en: ZHAO: Is her name Zhang Xiaoqing?
CHEN: Yes, that's her.

dialogue.pinyin: ZHĀO: nǐ rènwéi wǒ yǒu jīhuì ma?

dialogue.cn: 陈: 你？算了吧，你配不上她。
dialogue.pinyin: CHÉN: nǐ? suànle ba, nǐ pèi bú shàng tā.
dialogue.en: CHEN: You? Forget about it, she's out of your league.

dialogue.cn: 赵: 我要积极地争取。
dialogue.en: ZHAO: I need to be positive and try hard.

dialogue.pinyin: CHÉN: cóng míngtiān kāishǐ, nǐ měi tiān gěi tā mǎi zǎocān.
dialogue.en: CHEN: Starting tomorrow, buy her breakfast every morning.

L3-032.lessonTitle: Looking Forward to a Big Bonus in China

to celebrate the Chinese New Year

sentences.cn: 这个矿泉水的牌子你听说过吗?

hundred thousand.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ zhēn xiànmù tā, měi nián dōu kěyǐ qù lǚyóu .
sentences.en: I really envy her for being able to travel every year.

sentences.en: I envy her beauty. She is also very capable.

sentences.pinyin: zhè jiā jiànzhù gōngsī de zǒngbù zài Běijīng .
sentences.en: The headquarters of this construction company is in Beijing.
Year in Hong Kong.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ qùnián dé le zuìjiā yuángōng de chēnghào .
sentences.en: Last year I won the "best employee" title.
Four minus two equals two.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 快过年了。你最期待什么呢？
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: kuài guònián le. nǐ zuì qīdài shénme ne?
dialogue.en: LIU: Chinese New Year is almost here. What are you looking forward to the most?

dialogue.cn: TOM: 当然最期待年终奖了！不知道今年的年终奖是多少。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: dāngrán zuì qīdài nián zhōng jiǎng le! bù zhīdào jīnnián de nián zhōng jiǎng shì duōshao.
dialogue.en: TOM: Of course it's the year-end bonus! I'm wondering how much this year's bonus is.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 我朋友在建筑公司上班，去年得了十万。
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: wǒ péngyou zài jiànzhù gōngsī shàngbān, qùnián dé le shíwàn.
dialogue.en: LIU: My friend works at a construction company. He got 100,000 yuan last year.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 这么多？太羡慕了！不过他们的工作很辛苦。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: zhème duō? tài xiànmù le! búguò tāmen de gōngzuò hěn xīnkǔ.
dialogue.en: TOM: That much? I'm so envious! But their work is very hard.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 没错。我昨天看新闻说有人年终奖只发了一箱矿泉水。
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ: méicuò. wǒ zuótiān kàn xīnwén shuō yǒu rén nián zhōng jiǎng zhǐ fā le yī xiāng kuàngquánshuǐ.
dialogue.en: LIU: True. I saw on the news yesterday that somebody got a box of mineral water for their annual bonus.

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: zǒng bǐ méiyǒu hǎo ba.
dialogue.en: TOM: Well, it's better than nothing.

sentences.en: This is indeed a good price.

sentences.en: own is indeed not easy.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ huì fā yóujiàn tōngzhī nǐ de

sentences.pinyin: zhè shì nǐ de gōngzuò yóuxiāng hái shì nǐ de sīrén yóuxiāng ?

sentences.pinyin: diànshì lǐ de xīnwén nǐ néng tīngdǒng ma?

sentences.en: loudly, it will interrupt other people.

sentences.pinyin: tā bǎ lǐyóu jiěshì de hěn qīngchu .

sentences.en: It was difficult to travel long distance in the past.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ juéde zhōngwén hěn nán ma?
sentences.en: Do you think Chinese is difficult?

dialogue.en: (Knocking on the door)
TEACHER: Please come in.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 老师，不好意思打扰了。今天的课有点儿难，我没听 懂。您有空给我再解释一遍吗？
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: lǎoshī, bùhǎoyìsi dǎrǎo le. jīntiān de kè yǒu diǎnr nán, wǒ méi tīngdǒng. nín yǒukòng gěi wǒ zài jiěshì yíbiàn ma?
dialogue.en: TOM: Teacher, sorry to interrupt you. Today's lesson was a bit difficult. I didn't understand it. Do you have time to explain it to me one more time?

dialogue.cn: 老师: 是吗？今天的课确实有点难。但是我待会儿要去开会。 你发邮件给我，好吗？
dialogue.pinyin: LǍOSHĪ : shì ma? jīntiān de kè quèshí yǒu diǎnr  nán . dànshì wǒ dāi huìér yào qù kāihuì. nǐ fā yóujiàn gěi wǒ, hǎo ma?
dialogue.en: TEACHER: Is that so? Today's lesson is indeed a little difficult. But I have to go to a meeting later. Email me, ok?

dialogue.cn: TOM: 好的。老师您的邮箱是？
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: hǎo de. lǎoshī nín de yóuxiāng shì?
dialogue.en: TOM: Ok. What's your email address, teacher?

L3-037.lessonTitle: Taking A Taxi in China, Part 2

sentences.cn: 出门左转就有一个便利店.
sentences.pinyin: chūmén zuǒzhuǎn jiù yǒu yíge biànlìdiàn.
sentences.en: convenience store right there.

sentences.cn: 有些人过马路的时候从来不看红绿灯.

I’ll wait right at the intersection.

sentences.pinyin: Hái yǒu liǎnggè lùkǒu jiù dào le.

sentences.cn: 我从来不知道这条路是单行道.
sentences.pinyin: wǒ cónglái bù zhīdào zhè tiáo lù shì dānxíngdào
sentences.en: I never knew this road is one-way.

sentences.en: In what situation can you turn right at a red light?

sentences.cn: 他突然停下来, 好像想起了什么.
sentences.pinyin: tā tūrán tíng xiàlai, hǎoxiàng xiǎngqǐ le shénme.
sentences.en: about something.
Just stop right here.

sentences.pinyin: yánzhe zhè tiáo lù zhí zǒu jiù kěyǐ kànjiàn jiāyóuzhàn le .
sentences.en: Keep straight along this road, then you'll see the gas station.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 师傅，请在前面的路口左转。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: shīfu, qǐng zài qiánmiàn de lùkǒu zuǒzhuǎn.
dialogue.en: TOM: Sir, please take a left at the intersection ahead.

dialogue.cn: 司机: 不去和平饭店了吗？
dialogue.pinyin: SĪJĪ: bú qù hépíng fàndiàn le ma?
dialogue.en: DRIVER: We're not going to Peace Hotel now?

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: duì, tāmen huàn dìfang le.
dialogue.en: TOM: Correct. They changed the place.

dialogue.cn: 司机: 左转后直走吗？
dialogue.pinyin: SĪJĪ: zuǒzhuǎn hòu zhí zǒu ma?
dialogue.en: DRIVER: Go straight after turning left?

dialogue.cn: TOM: 直走，然后在下一个红绿灯右转。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: zhí zǒu, ránhòu zài xiàyíge hónglǜdēng yòu zhuǎn.
dialogue.en: TOM: Keep straight, then take a right at the next traffic light.

dialogue.cn: 司机: 那边不能右转，是单行道。
dialogue.pinyin: SĪJĪ: nàbiān bùnéng yòuzhuǎn, shì dānxíngdào.
dialogue.en: DRIVER: We can't take a right there-it's a one-way street.

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: hǎo ba, jiù zài zhè tíng.
dialogue.en: TOM: All right. Let's stop right here, then.

measure word for long, thin objects

sentences.cn: 这段话特别难懂, 你能帮我解释一下吗?

sentences.cn: 我还是不确定你能不能在人群中发现我。

I noticed that you recently lost weight.

sentences.pinyin: zhè jiāng shì yì tiáo hěn cháng hěn cháng de lù.

Where is Huai Hai Road? - PLEASE SHOW ME THE WAY TO DELICIOUS FOOD IN CHINA!

sentences.cn: 牛肉有营养,味道好,所以很多人都爱吃.
sentences.pinyin: niúròu yǒu yíngyǎng, wèidao hǎo, suǒyǐ hěn duō rén dōu ài chī.
sentences.en: why so many people like it.
Do you like to eat beef?

dialogue.cn: 刘: 我发现一个特别好吃的餐馆。
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : wǒ fāxiàn yí ge tèbié hǎochī de cānguǎn.
dialogue.en: LIU: I found a very delicious restaurant.
TOM: What kind of food do they have?
LIU: Vietnamese food. - PLEASE SHOW ME THE WAY TO DELICIOUS FOOD IN CHINA!

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: wǒ tèbié ài chī Yuènán niúròu fěn ! kuài gàosu wǒ, zài nǎ tiáo lù shang?
dialogue.en: TOM: I love Vietnamese beef pho! Tell me now, which road is it on?
LIU: It's on Middle Fuxing Road.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 复兴中路？靠近什么路？
dialogue.en: TOM: Middle Fuxing Road? Adjacent to which road?

dialogue.cn: 刘: 复兴中路靠近宝庆路。
dialogue.en: LIU: Middle Fuxing Road is adjacent to Baoqing Road.

sentences.pinyin: tā shì Zhōngguó rén, tā tàitai shì Fǎguó rén.

She graduated from Southwest University.
There are no men in my division.

sentences.pinyin: zhè liàng chē de qiánbù xūyào xiūlǐ.

sentences.pinyin: bīnguǎn fùjìn yǒu hěn duō cānguǎn.
sentences.en: hotel.

sentences.pinyin: gōngyuán de nánbiān yǒu yíge réngōng hú.
sentences.en: part of the park.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ jiā lí nǐ jiā hěnjìn, yǒukòng cháng lái wán.
sentences.en: My place is close to your place; come hang out when you have time.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 我还不知道你是哪里人。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: wǒ hái bù zhīdào nǐ shì nǎlǐ rén.
dialogue.en: TOM: I don't know yet where you’re from.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 云南是一个省吗？云南在哪里？
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: Yúnnán shì yí ge shěng ma? Yúnnán zài nǎlǐ?
dialogue.en: TOM: Is Yunnan a province? Where is Yunnan?

dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : Yúnnán shì yí ge shěng, zài Zhōngguó de xī’nánbù.

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: shì zài Sìchuān fùjìn ma?
dialogue.en: TOM: Is it close to Sichuan?
LIU: It's to the south of Sichuan.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 离上海真远。你回家肯定很不容易吧。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: lí Shànghǎi zhēn yuǎn. nǐ huíjiā kěndìng hěn bù róngyì ba.
dialogue.en: TOM: That's so far away from Shanghai. It must not be easy for you to go home, right?

L3-041.lessonTitle: Making a Reservation at a Chinese Restaurant

sentences.en: Let's meet in the lobby

sentences.cn: 早餐在二楼的大厅, 从早上七点到十点.
sentences.pinyin: zǎocān zài èrlóu de dàtīng, cóng zǎoshang qī diǎn dào shí diǎn.
sentences.en: Breakfast is in the hall on the second floor from 7:00 am to 10:00 am.

sentences.cn: 我们这的包厢有大,中,小, 请问您要哪种?
sentences.pinyin: wǒmen zhè de bāoxiāng yǒu dà, zhōng, xiǎo, qǐngwèn nín yào nǎ zhòng?
sentences.en: Our private boxes have large, medium, and small rooms; which kind would you like?

sentences.cn: 很高兴收到贵公司的回复.
sentences.pinyin: hěn gāoxìng shōudào guì gōngsī de huífù.
sentences.en: I’m glad to receive a response from your honored company.

sentences.cn: 我看电影的时候喜欢坐在后面的座位
sentences.pinyin: wǒ kàn diànyǐng de shíhou xǐhuān zuò zài hòumian de zuòwèi.
sentences.en: the rear seats.

sentences.cn: 这家酒店新开张, 我们哪天去试试吧.
sentences.pinyin: zhè jiā jiǔdiàn xīn kāizhāng, wǒmen nǎ tiān qù shìshi ba.
sentences.en: out some time.

sentences.cn: 他开的咖啡店生意太好了, 每次都需要订座.
sentences.pinyin: tā kāi de kāfēidiàn shēngyi tài hǎole, měicì dōu xūyào dìng zuò.
sentences.en: The cafe he owns is really popular; you need to reserve seats every time.

sentences.cn: 麻烦您稍等, 经理马上就开完会了.
sentences.pinyin: máfan nín shāoděng, jīnglǐ mǎshàng jiù kāi wán huì le.
sentences.en: be done with his meeting very soon.
Please wait a moment.

dialogue.cn: 服务员: 您好。福满园酒店。
dialogue.pinyin: FÚWÙYUÁN : nínhǎo. fú mǎn yuán jiǔdiàn.
dialogue.en: WAITRESS: Hello. This is Fumanyuan Restaurant.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 你好，明天下午还有座位吗？我想订座。
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : nǐhǎo, míngtiān xiàwǔ hái yǒu zuòwèi ma? wǒ xiǎng dìng zuò.
dialogue.en: LIU: Hi. Are there still any tables available for tomorrow afternoon? I want to make a reservation.

dialogue.cn: 服务员: 请稍等。不好意思, 明天下午只有大厅没有包厢。大厅可 以吗？
dialogue.pinyin: FÚWÙYUÁN : qǐng shāoděng. bùhǎoyìsi ,míngtiān xiàwǔ zhǐyǒu dàtīng méiyǒu bāoxiāng. dàtīng kěyǐ ma?
dialogue.en: WAITRESS: Please wait a moment. I'm sorry, we only have tables in the dining hall, not in the private rooms. Will the dining hall work?
LIU: That’s fine.
WAITRESS: For how many people?
LIU: Five.

dialogue.cn: 服务员: 请问您贵姓，手机号码是多少？
dialogue.pinyin: FÚWÙYUÁN : qǐngwèn nín guìxìng, shǒujī hàomǎ shì duōshao?
dialogue.en: WAITRESS: What’s your name and cell phone number?

L3-042.lessonTitle: Which Delicious Chinese Dish Would You Like to Order?

sentences.cn: 来一个奶酪蛋糕和一杯摩卡咖啡, 谢谢.

sentences.pinyin: zhèli de qīngjiāo niúliǔ hěn là ma ?

sentences.pinyin: zhè jiā cānguǎn jiēshòu wǎngshàng yùdìng.
sentences.en: reservations.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ xiān qù, wǒ yìhuìr jiù dào.
sentences.en: You go first; I’ll be there very soon.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xiān qù nàlǐ děng wǒ.

You go first.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ māma zuò de cài zuì hǎo chī.

This dish is delicious.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng cháng chang cǎoméi wèi de.
sentences.en: I want to try the strawberry flavored one.

sentences.en: American television shows are very popular among young people in China.

dialogue.cn: 服务员: 小姐您好，请问有预订吗？
dialogue.pinyin: FÚWÙYUÁN : xiǎojie nínhǎo, qǐngwèn yǒu yùdìng ma?
dialogue.en: WAITRESS: Hello, miss, do you have a reservation?

dialogue.cn: 刘: 有。我姓刘。预订了今晚的大厅，五个人。
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : yǒu. wǒ xìng liú. yùdìng le jīnwǎn de dàtīng, wǔ gèrén.
dialogue.en: LIU: Yes. My family name is Liu. I reserved a dining hall table for tonight for five people.
WAITRESS: Okay. This way, please.

dialogue.cn: 刘: 请问你们这里哪个菜最受外国人欢迎？
dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : qǐngwèn nǐmen zhèli nǎ ge cài zuì shòu wàiguórén huānyíng?

dialogue.cn: 服务员: 我们这里的青椒牛柳很好吃。您要尝尝吗？
dialogue.pinyin: FÚWÙYUÁN : wǒmen zhèli de qīngjiāo niúliǔ hěn hǎochī. nín yào chángchang ma?
dialogue.en: WAITRESS: The green pepper and beef here is very tasty. Would you like to try it?

dialogue.pinyin: LIÚ : hǎo, jiù xiān lái yí ge qīngjiāo niúliǔ ba.
dialogue.en: LIU: Sure, let's have that first.

sentences.pinyin: shéi zài zuòfàn? hǎo xiāng a!

I'll have a bottle of beer.

sentences.pinyin: xiǎohái dōu xǐhuān hē tián de yǐnliào.
sentences.en: Children all love sweet drinks.”

sentences.cn: 再喝点鸡汤, 对身体好.
sentences.pinyin: zài hē diǎn jītāng, duì shēntǐ hǎo.
sentences.en: for you.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng hē yī bēi hóngchá.

Xinjiang lamb is very delicious.
Lamb is extremely delicious.

sentences.pinyin: zhēnshì yī dùn fēngshèng de wǎncān!

sentences.pinyin: zhè píng hóngjiǔ shì èr líng líng sān nián de.

sentences.en: anything, just let me know.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ shì xīkè, cái lái guo liǎng cì.

I'm so nervous when I'm driving.

dialogue.pinyin: ZHŌU : Tom, xiǎng hē diǎn shénme? píjiǔ hái shì hóngjiǔ?
dialogue.en: ZHOU: Tom, what would you like to drink? Beer or red wine?

dialogue.cn: TOM: 我开车来的，还是喝点饮料吧。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: wǒ kāichē lái de, hái shì hē diǎn yǐnliào ba.

dialogue.pinyin: TOM: zhōu tàitai zuò le zhème duō cài, tài fēngshèng le.
dialogue.en: TOM: Mrs. Zhou made so many different dishes. It's amazing!

dialogue.cn: 周: 因为你是稀客，所以她从昨晚就开始准备了。这个是羊 肉，你尝尝。
dialogue.pinyin: ZHŌU : yīnwèi nǐ shì xīkè, suǒyǐ tā cóng zuówǎn jiù kāishǐ zhǔnbèi le. zhège shì yángròu, nǐ cháng chang.

L3-046.lessonTitle: What's In This Mystery Package from China?

sentences.cn: 今天不行, 那就明天好了.
sentences.pinyin: jīntiān bù xíng, nà jiù míngtiān hǎo le.
sentences.en: If today isn’t good, then tomorrow is fine.

sentences.cn: 网上的新闻都是真的吗?
sentences.pinyin: wǎngshàng de xīnwén dōu shì zhēnde ma?
sentences.en: Is the news online real?
Please sign right here.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ gěi nǐ jìle yí ge bāoguǒ.
sentences.en: I sent you a package.
Everybody, let’s introduce ourselves.
Let me do it myself.

sentences.cn: 我饿的时候总会买很多食品。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ è de shíhòu zǒng huì mǎi hěn duō shípǐn .
sentences.en: I always buy too many groceries when I am hungry.

sentences.cn: 我们晚上打算去超市买东西.
sentences.pinyin: wǒmen wǎnshang dǎsuàn qù chāoshì mǎi dōngxi.
sentences.en: We plan to go get something at the supermarket in the evening.

sentences.cn: 你这么做到底是为什么?
sentences.pinyin: nǐ zhè me zuò dàodǐ shì wèishénme?
sentences.en: What on earth are you doing this for?
This is indeed a good price.

sentences.cn: 一个人在国外生活确实不容易.
sentences.pinyin: yí ge rén zài guówài shēnghuó quèshí bù róngyì .
sentences.en: Living outside your own country on your own is indeed not easy.

dialogue.cn: 快递哥: 你好。王洁的包裹。
dialogue.pinyin: KUÀIDÌ GĒ : nǐhǎo. Wáng Jié de bāoguǒ.
dialogue.en: DELIVERY GUY: Excuse me. This is a package for Wang Jie.

dialogue.cn: 王: 给我的？我没有在网上买东西啊。
dialogue.pinyin: WÁNG : gěi wǒ de? wǒ méiyǒu zài wǎngshàng mǎi dōngxi ā.
dialogue.en: WANG: For me? I didn't buy anything online.

dialogue.cn: 快递哥: 这个确实是给你的。请在这里签字。
dialogue.pinyin: KUÀIDÌ GĒ : zhège quèshí shì gěi nǐ de. qǐng zài zhèlǐ qiānzì.
dialogue.en: DELIVERY GUY: This is for you. Please sign here.
WANG: Okay.
DELIVERY GUY: Thanks.

dialogue.cn: 王: 等一下，里面到底是什么？
dialogue.pinyin: WÁNG : děng yìxià, lǐmiàn dàodǐ shì shénme?
dialogue.en: WANG: Wait, what’s inside the box?

dialogue.cn: 快递哥: 不好意思，这个我们也不知道。
dialogue.pinyin: KUÀIDÌ GĒ : bùhǎoyìsi, zhège wǒmen yě bù zhīdào.
dialogue.en: DELIVERY GUY: Sorry, we don't know either.

dialogue.cn: 王: 好吧。我自己打开看看好了。
dialogue.pinyin: WÁNG : hǎo ba. wǒ zìjǐ dǎkāi kànkan hǎo le.
dialogue.en: WANG: Okay. I'll open it myself and find out, then.

L3-049.lessonTitle: Checking in at a Chinese Hotel

sentences.cn: 麦当劳里有免费无线网.
sentences.pinyin: Màidāngláo lǐ yǒu miǎnfèi wúxiàn wǎng.
sentences.en: There is free Wi-Fi at McDonald's.

sentences.cn: 一台苹果电脑的价钱可以买两台普通的笔记本电脑.
sentences.pinyin: yì tái píngguǒ diànnǎo de jiàqian kěyǐ mǎi liǎng tái pǔtōng de bǐjìběn diànnǎo.
sentences.en: two ordinary laptop computers.

sentences.pinyin: měi nián dōu shì yíyàng de chéngxù .
sentences.en: It is the same procedure as every year.

sentences.cn: 我和你一样, 也喜欢旅游.
sentences.pinyin: wǒ hé nǐ yīyàng, yě xǐhuān lǚyóu.
sentences.en: I’m the same with you; I also like traveling.

sentences.pinyin: dàchuáng fáng jīntiān dǎ jiǔ zhé .
sentences.en: The king room is ten percent off today.

sentences.cn: 上车时请出示您的车票.
sentences.pinyin: shàngchē shí qǐngchūshì nín de chēpiào.
sentences.en: Please present your ticket when boarding.

sentences.cn: 听起来可能难以相信，但是我其实很喜欢打扫。
sentences.pinyin: tīng qǐlai kěnéng nányǐ xiāngxìn , dànshì wǒ qíshí hěn xǐhuān dǎsǎo .
sentences.en: I might be crazy, but I actually love cleaning.
Did you clean?
Let’s clean the room together.

sentences.cn: 请问, 几点可以办理入住?
sentences.en: May I ask, when can I check in?

sentences.cn: 我没有护照, 其他身份证件可以吗?
sentences.pinyin: wǒ méiyǒu hùzhào, qítā shēnfèn zhèngjiàn kěyǐ
sentences.en: ma? I don’t have my passport; will other identification work?

sentences.cn: 如果不介意的话，你愿意和我们一起吃晚饭吗？
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ bú jièyì dehuà , nǐ yuànyì hé wǒmen yīqǐ chī wǎnfàn ma ?
sentences.en: If you don't mind, would you like to join us for dinner?

sentences.pinyin: nǐ jièyì wǒ jiào nǐ Xiǎo Lǐ ma?
sentences.en: Do you mind if I call you Xiao Li?

sentences.cn: 我吃了你的布丁你介意吗？
sentences.pinyin: wǒ chī le nǐ de bùdīng nǐ jièyì ma ?
sentences.en: Do you mind that I ate your pudding?
All the standard rooms are on the second floor.

dialogue.en: TOM: Excuse me, I'd like to check in, please.

dialogue.cn: 酒店员工: 好的。请出示您的身份证件。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǓDIÀN YUÁNGŌNG: hǎo de. qǐng chūshì nín de shēnfèn zhèngjiàn.
dialogue.en: HOTEL STAFF: Yes, sir. Please show me your ID.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 我订了三个晚上的标准房。
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: wǒ dìng le sān ge wǎnshang de biāozhǔn fáng.
dialogue.en: TOM: I booked a standard room for three nights.

dialogue.cn: 酒店员工: 不好意思先生，标准房现在在打扫，还需要一个小时。 您不介意的话，有一个大床房可以入住。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǓDIÀN YUÁNGŌNG: bùhǎoyìsi xiānsheng, biāozhǔn fáng xiànzài zài dǎsǎo, hái xūyào yíge xiǎoshí. nín bú jièyì dehuà, yǒu yíge dàchuáng fáng kěyǐ rùzhù.
dialogue.en: HOTEL STAFF: I'm sorry, sir. The standard rooms are being cleaned, and it'll be another hour before they are available. If you don't mind, there's a king room available now.

dialogue.cn: TOM: 大床房和标准房是一样大吗？
dialogue.pinyin: TOM: dàchuáng fáng hé biāozhǔn fáng shì yíyàng dà ma?
dialogue.en: TOM: Is the king room the same size as the standard room?

dialogue.cn: 酒店员工: 是的，而且是一样的价钱，也有免费早餐。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǓDIÀN YUÁNGŌNG : shì de, érqiě shì yíyàng de jiàqian, yě yǒu miǎnfèi zǎocān.
dialogue.en: HOTEL STAFF: Yes. It's the same price, too, and it also comes with free breakfast.

sentences.cn: Yuting, 你愿意嫁给我吗？我愿意。

dialogue.cn: A : 是吗？我听说很多人因为拆迁都成了千万富翁了。
dialogue.pinyin: Shì ma? Wǒ tīngshuō hěnduō rén yīnwèi chāiqiān dōu chéng le qiānwànfùwēng le.
dialogue.en: Really? I hear a lot of people became multi-millionaires because of demolition.

dialogue.cn: B : 那是远郊区政府征地，我们这种危改的不行。
dialogue.pinyin: Nà shì yuǎn jiāoqū zhèngfǔ zhēngdì, wǒmen zhèzhǒng wēi gǎi de bùxíng.
dialogue.en: That's what happens when land is expropriated by the government in the suburbs. This kind of transformation of dangerous buildings isn't treated the same.

dialogue.cn: A : 哦，我不知道这里面原来还有这么多学问。
dialogue.pinyin: O, wǒ bù zhīdào zhè lǐmiàn yuánlái háiyǒu zhème duō xuéwèn.
dialogue.en: Oh. I didn't know there was so much to learn about this.

dialogue.cn: B : 这里边的门道儿多着呢。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Zhè lǐ biān de méndaor duō zhe ne.
dialogue.en: There's a lot going on here.

dialogue.pinyin: A : 聽說你們家的老房子要拆遷 了？
B : 對，不過我們家都商量好了做“釘子戶”。
A : 怎麼呢？政府的賠償不滿意？
B : 對，賠得太少，也不能原地回遷。
A : 是嗎？我聽說很多人因為拆遷都成了千萬富翁了。
B : 那是遠郊區政府徵地，我們這種危改的不行。
A : 哦，我不知道這裡面原來還有這麼多學問。
B : 這裡邊的門道兒多著呢。

L5-005.lessonTitle: How Can the Common Man Find Love in China?

sentences.cn: 她一心想找高富帅，一般人连看都不看一眼。
sentences.pinyin: Tā yīxīn xiǎng zhǎo gāofù shuài, yībānrén lián kàn dōu bù kàn yīyǎn.
sentences.en: handsome man, and won't look at anyone else.

sentences.pinyin: Dàjiā dōu zài tán liàn'ài, wǒ de chūntiān zài nǎr?
sentences.en: Everyone is falling in love. Where's my chance to?

sentences.cn: 机会不等人。如果你们看对眼儿了，就别犹豫了。
sentences.pinyin: Jīhuì bù děng rén, rúguǒ nǐmen kànduìyǎnr le, jiù bié yóuyù le.
sentences.en: hit it off, then don't hesitate.

sentences.cn: 穷屌丝经常在相亲中屡战屡败。
sentences.pinyin: Qióngdiǎosī jīngcháng zài xiāngqīn zhōng lǚzhànlǚbài.
sentences.en: When it comes to blind dates, losers often fail repeatedly.

sentences.cn: 现在相亲成了很多年轻人认识异性的唯一途径。
sentences.pinyin: Xiànzài xiāngqīn chéng le hěnduō niánqīngrén rènshi yìxìng de wéiyī tújìng.
sentences.en: Right now, blind dates are the only way for a lot young people to meet people of the opposite gender.

sentences.cn: 其实很多白富美并不像人们想像的那么高傲。
sentences.pinyin: Qíshí hěnduō bái fùměi bìng bù xiàng rénmen xiǎngxiàng dì nàme gāo'ào.
sentences.en: aren't as stuck up as some people think.

sentences.cn: 据说现在70%的年轻女孩儿都想嫁大叔。
sentences.pinyin: Jùshuō xiànzài 70% de niánqīng nǚháir dōu xiǎng jià dàshū.
sentences.en: It's said that 70% of young girls now want to marry an older man.

sentences.cn: 现在每个女孩心中的白马王子都是高富帅。
sentences.pinyin: Xiànzài měi gè nǚhái xīnzhōng de báimǎwángzǐ dōu shì gāofùshuài.
sentences.en: Right now, the prince in the heart of every girl is a tall, rich and handsome guy.

dialogue.cn: A : 又去相亲了？这次看对眼儿没有？
dialogue.pinyin: A : Yòu qù xiāngqīn le? Zhè cì kànduìyǎnr méiyǒu?
dialogue.en: Went on another blind date? See anyone you like?

dialogue.cn: B : 嘿，这次还真来了个白富美！
dialogue.pinyin: B : Hēi, zhè cì hái zhēn lái le gè báifùměi!
dialogue.en: You know what? This time, there was actually a white, rich and beautiful girl.

dialogue.cn: A : 那不正好，你快展开攻势啊？
dialogue.pinyin: A : Nà bù zhènghǎo, nǐ kuài zhǎnkāi gōngshì a?
dialogue.en: Isn't that great? Why don't you go on and attack?

dialogue.cn: B : 别提了，人家嫌我不是高富帅，只是个穷屌丝。
dialogue.pinyin: B : Biétíle, rénjiā xián wǒ bù shì gāofùshuài, zhǐ shì gè qióngdiǎosī.
dialogue.en: Don't mention it. She dislikes that I'm not a tall, wealthy and handsome guy, but just a poor loser.

dialogue.cn: A : 唉，我们屌丝的春天什么时候才能来呀？
dialogue.pinyin: A : Āi, wǒmen diǎosī de chūntiān shénme shíhou cái néng lái ya?
dialogue.en: Ai. When will spring come for us poor losers.

dialogue.cn: B : 哎，你不是跟你的初恋复合了吗？
dialogue.pinyin: B : Āi, nǐ bù shì gēn nǐ de chūliàn fùhé le ma?
dialogue.en: Hey, didn't you say you are going back with your first girlfriend?

dialogue.cn: A : 哪儿啊，她说我太幼稚，一心只想嫁大叔。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: A : Nǎr a, tā shuō wǒ tài yòuzhì, yīxīn zhǐ xiǎng jià dàshū.
dialogue.en: Don't mention it. She said that I'm too childish and she only want to marry someone older. dialogue.pinyin: A : 又去相親了？這次看對眼兒沒有？

L5-008.lessonTitle: Do You Trust Chinese Milk Powder?

sentences.cn: 发生食品安全问题以后，最重要的是重新整顿市场。
sentences.pinyin: Fāshēng shípǐn ānquán wèntí yǐhòu, zuì zhòngyào de shì chóngxīn zhěngdùn shìchǎng.
sentences.en: After a food safety crisis, the most important thing is to reorganized the market.

sentences.cn: 中国的国产奶制品遭遇了信誉危机。
sentences.pinyin: Zhōngguó de guóchǎn nǎizhìpǐn zāoyù le xìnyù wéijī.
sentences.en: have suffered reputational crisis.

sentences.cn: 孩子现在太小，还不能断奶。
sentences.pinyin: Háizǐ xiànzài tài xiǎo, hái bùnéng duànnǎi.
sentences.en: The infant is still too small; it can't be weaned.

sentences.cn: 孩子饿得直哭，我去给他冲奶粉。
sentences.pinyin: Háizi è de zhí kū, wǒ qù gěi tā chōng nǎifěn.
sentences.en: I'm going to give it some milk powder.

sentences.cn: 出境的时候，海关会在你的护照上盖章。
sentences.pinyin: Chūjìng de shíhou, hǎiguān huì zài nǐ de hùzhào shàng gàizhāng.
sentences.en: stamp on your passport.

sentences.cn: 这些罐子应该放在可回收垃圾箱里。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè xiē guàn zǐ yīnggāi fàng zài kě huíshōu lājīxiāng lǐ .
sentences.en: These cans should be put in the recyle bin

sentences.cn: 这家超市的奶粉限购两罐。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiā chāoshì de nǎifěn xiàngòu liǎng guàn.
sentences.en: two tins.

sentences.cn: 这里的限制很严格，多买奶粉会被罚款。
sentences.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de xiànzhì hěn yángé, duō mǎi nǎifěn huì bèi fákuǎn.
sentences.en: The restriction here is very severe. If you buy more milk powder you will be fined.

sentences.cn: 很多中国父母都从网上买国外的奶粉。
sentences.pinyin: Hěnduō zhōngguó fùmǔ dōu cóng wǎngshàng mǎi guówài de nǎifěn.
sentences.en: online.

sentences.cn: 不是我没能耐，实在是法律不允许。
sentences.pinyin: Bùshì wǒ méi néngnài, shízài shì fǎlǜ bù yǔnxǔ.
sentences.en: It's not that I don't have the ability to do it. It's said it's illegal to do it.

dialogue.pinyin: Yòu qù xiānggǎng bèi nǎifěn le?
dialogue.en: You went to Hong Kong to buy milk powder again?

dialogue.cn: 别提了，这次只背回来两罐，老婆直骂我没能耐。
dialogue.pinyin: Biétí le, zhè cì zhǐ bèi huí lái liǎngguàn, lǎopó zhí mà wǒ méi néngnài.
dialogue.en: Don't mention it. I was only able to buy two cans this time. My wife said I was so incapable.

dialogue.cn: 现在不是法律限制从香港出境最多只能带两罐奶粉吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Xiànzài bùshì fǎlǜ xiànzhì cóng xiānggǎng chūjìng zuìduō zhǐ néng dài liǎngguàn nǎifěn ma?
dialogue.en: Isn't there a legal restriction against people who leave Hong Kong taking more than two tins of milk powder?

dialogue.cn: 对呀，可是自从断奶以后，我家宝宝实在不够吃呀，国产奶粉又太不放心。
dialogue.pinyin: Duì ya, kěshì zìcóng duànnǎi yǐhòu, wǒjiā bǎobǎo shízài bùgòu chī ya, guóchǎn nǎifěn yòu tài bù fàngxīn.
dialogue.en: That's right. But my baby really doesn't have enough to eat since being weaned. And we are so worried about the milk powder in China.

dialogue.cn: 其实我听说后来行业整顿得还不错。
dialogue.pinyin: Qíshí wǒ tīngshuō hòulái hángyè zhěngdùn de hái bùcuò.
dialogue.en: Actually, I heard the industry is much better now.

dialogue.cn: 我们是一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳啊，再说谁敢拿自己的孩子做实验呢。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒmen shì yīzhāobèishéyǎo, shíniánpàjǐngshéng a, zàishuō shuí gǎn ná zìjǐ de háizi zuò shíyàn ne.
dialogue.en: Once bitten, twice shy. And who takes experiments on their own children? Class 整顿 整頓 zhěngdùn to reorganize verb 国产 國產 guóchǎn domestically produced product noun 断奶 斷奶 duànnǎi to wean verb 直 直 zhí already adv 出境 出境 chūjìng to leave the country verb 罐 罐 guàn can measure word 限制 限制 xiànzhì restriction noun 奶粉 奶粉 nǎifěn milk powder noun 能耐 能耐 néngnài ability noun

dialogue.pinyin: 別提了，這次只背回來兩罐，老婆直罵我沒能耐。
現在不是法律限制從香港出境最多只能帶兩罐奶粉嗎？
對呀，可是自從斷奶以後，我家寶寶實在不夠吃呀，國產奶粉又太不放心。
其實我聽說後來行業整頓得還不錯。
我們是一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井繩啊，再說誰敢拿自己的孩子做實驗呢。

sentences.cn: 你看到那个烟囱里排出的废气了吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ kàndào nàgè yāncōng lǐ páichū de fèiqìle ma?
sentences.en: Do you see the smoke exhaust coming out of the chimeny?

sentences.cn: 这个味道真刺鼻，我都喘不过气来了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège wèidào zhēn cìbí, wǒ dū chuǎn bùguò qì láile.
sentences.en: The smell is really stinging my nose. I could hardly breath.

sentences.cn: 道路两边的汽车尾气味儿很重。
sentences.pinyin: Dàolù liǎngbiān de qìchē wěi qìwèi er hěn zhòng
sentences.en: of the road.

sentences.cn: 我是外行，您能帮我指导一下吗？
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ shì wàiháng, nín néng bāng wǒ zhǐdǎo yīxià
sentences.en: ma? I'm an outsider. Can you give me direction please?
The water has been polluted.

sentences.cn: 去年冬天，所有北京人都学到了一个新名词，雾霾。
sentences.pinyin: Qùnián dōngtiān, suǒyǒu běijīng rén dōu xué dàole yīgè xīn míngcí, wù mái.
sentences.en: smog.

sentences.cn: 这儿能见度很低，你要小心驾驶。
sentences.pinyin: zhè'er néngjiàndù hěn dī, nǐ yào xiǎoxīn jiàshǐ
sentences.en: Visibility here is really low. You have to be careful when driving.

sentences.cn: 伦敦过去在冬季常有雾。
sentences.pinyin: Lúndūn guòqù zài dōngjì cháng yǒu wù.
sentences.en: In the past, London often had fog in the winter.

sentences.cn: 他感冒了。要把肺咳出来了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā gǎnmàole. Yào bǎ fèi hāi chūláile.
sentences.en: He's got a cold, and he's close to coughing up his lung.

dialogue.cn: 北京的雾怎么这么大啊？
dialogue.pinyin: Běijīng de wù zěnme zhème dà a?
dialogue.en: How can Beijing have so much fog?

dialogue.cn: 你外行了吧？这不是雾，是雾霾。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ wàihángle ba? Zhè bùshì wù, shì wù mái.
dialogue.en: You are not from around here, huh? This isn't fog. It's smog.
What's smog?

dialogue.cn: 雾霾里面全是污染物，吸进肺里就出不来了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wù mái lǐmiàn quán shì wūrǎn wù, xī jìn fèi li jiù chū bù láile.
dialogue.en: Smog is made of particles of pollution. Once you breathe them in, they don't come out.

dialogue.cn: 能见度真低啊，我觉得我们好像在恐怖片里。北京怎么污染这么厉害呢？
dialogue.pinyin: Néngjiàndù zhēn dī a, wǒ juéde wǒmen hǎoxiàng zài kǒngbù piàn li. Běijīng zěnme wūrǎn zhème lìhài ne?
dialogue.en: Visibility is really low. I feel like we are in a horror film. How can Beijing's pollution be so bad?

dialogue.cn: 我猜是汽车尾气加上冬天供暖的废气。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ cāi shì qìchē wěiqì jiā shàng dōngtiān gōngnuǎn de fèiqì.
dialogue.en: I'm guessing it's car exhaust coupled with winter coal burning.
This smell really burns your nostrils.

dialogue.cn: 我们还是赶紧回家吧。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒmen háishì gǎnjǐn huí jiā ba.
dialogue.en: We'd better get home quickly.

dialogue.pinyin: 北京的霧怎麼這麼大啊？
你外行了吧？這不是霧，是霧霾。
霧霾裡面全是污染物，吸進肺裡就出不來了。
能見度真低啊，我覺得我們好像在恐怖片裡。北京怎麼污染這麼厲害呢？
我猜是汽車尾氣加上冬天供暖的廢氣。

sentences.cn: 打起精神来，别破罐子破摔。

sentences.cn: 你别说，你推荐的这个口罩还真好用。

dialogue.cn: 又刮沙尘暴了，真讨厌，你看我这灰头土脸的。

dialogue.pinyin: Běijīng xiànzài xiǎng kàn yīgè lántiān jīběn kào fēng, shāchénbào zhè yī guā, kěxīrùkēlìwù méi le, nǐ shuō hǎo bù hǎo?
dialogue.en: If you want to see a blue sky now in Beijing, it needs to be a windy day. And the pollution goes when the sandstorm comes. Don't you think it's good?

L5-011.lessonTitle: Getting Caught in a Chinese Traffic Jam

sentences.cn: 考试分为交规和路考，都过了才能拿到驾照。
sentences.pinyin: Kǎoshì fēnwéi jiāoguī hé lùkǎo, dōu guò le cáinéng nádào jiàzhào.
sentences.en: test, and you won't get your license until you pass both.

sentences.cn: 司机开得太快了，怪不得会出事。
sentences.pinyin: Sījī kāi de tài kuài le, guàibùdé huì chūshì.
sentences.en: accident.
The engine stalled all of a sudden.
Do you get car sick?

sentences.cn: 司机由于没有遵守交通规则而被罚款。
sentences.pinyin: Sījī yóuyú méiyǒu zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé ér bèi fákuǎn.
sentences.en: the traffic rules.
We all respect the law.

sentences.pinyin: Tā měng de diàotóu wǎng huí kāi.
sentences.en: He made a sharp U-turn and headed back.
That car turned around.

sentences.cn: 他收到了一张追尾的罚单。
sentences.pinyin: Tā shōudào le yìzhāng zhuīwěi de fádān.
sentences.en: He got a ticket for rear-ending another vehicle.
You should signal before you change lanes.

sentences.cn: 虽然交规上说开车时要给行人让道，可在马路上几乎没有人这么做。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán jiāoguīshàng shuō kāichē shí yào gěi xíngrén ràng dào, kě zài mǎlù shàng jīhū méiyǒu rén zhème zuò.
sentences.en: pedestrians, but almost no one does that.

sentences.pinyin: Fēng hěn dà, lùshang xíngrén hěn shǎo.
sentences.en: on the street.

dialogue.en: Driver, please go to Sanyuanqiao.

dialogue.cn: 哎哎哎，你别系安全带呀！我这个好几年没用了。
dialogue.pinyin: Āi āi āi, nǐ bié xì ānquán dài ya! Wǒ zhège hǎojǐ nián méi yòngle.
dialogue.en: Arrr, don't use the seat belt! It's not been used for several years.

dialogue.cn: 我... 哎哟，师傅，您能别并线并得这么快吗？我晕车。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ... Āiyō, shīfu, nín néng bié bìng xiàn bìng de zhème kuài ma? Wǒ yùnchē.
dialogue.en: I'm ... Oh, driver, can you not cut the line so suddenly? I am getting car sick.

dialogue.cn: 堵得这么厉害，你看那些行人还不遵守交规，不并线咱们什么时候能过去？
dialogue.pinyin: Dǔ de zhème lìhài, nǐ kàn nàxiē xíngrén hái bù zūnshǒu jiāoguī, bù bìng xiàn zánmen shénme shíhou néng guòqù?
dialogue.en: There are already so many cars, but you see those pedestrians don't follow traffic rules, when can we get to the other side if we don't cut lines?

dialogue.cn: 哎呀，前边追尾了，怪不得这边动不了呢。
dialogue.pinyin: Āiyā, qiánbian zhuīwěile, guàibùdé zhè biān dòng bùliǎo ne.
dialogue.en: Ah, there's a car accident at the front, no wonder there's a traffic jam.

dialogue.cn: 要不咱们掉个头？算了，我熄了火等着吧。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Yào bù zánmen diào gètóu? Suànle, wǒ xīle huǒ děngzhe ba.
dialogue.en: How about a U-turn? Nevermind, let's stop the engine and wait. Class 交规 交規 jiāoguī traffic rules noun 怪不得 怪不得 guàibùdé no wonder expression 熄火 熄火 xīhuǒ to extinguish; to stall verb 晕车 暈車 yùnchē motion sickness phrase 遵守 遵守 zūnshǒu to comply with verb 掉头 掉頭 diàotóu U-turn phrase 追尾 追尾 zhuīwěi rear-end verb 并线 並線 bìng xiàn to change lanes verb 行人 行人 xíngrén pedestrian noun

dialogue.pinyin: 哎哎哎，你別係安全帶呀！我這個好幾年沒用了。
我... 哎喲，師傅，您能別并線並得這麼快嗎？我暈車。
堵得這麼厲害，你看那些行人還不遵守交規，不并線咱們什麼時候能過去？
哎呀，前邊追尾了，怪不得這邊動不了呢。
要不咱們掉個頭？算了，我熄了火等著吧。

vocab.en: private settlement; to settle privately noun/

sentences.pinyin: Tā zài yìchǎng shìgù zhōng xiā le.
sentences.en: "He got blinded in an accident."

sentences.cn: 在下一个拐角左转，然后沿着河岸往前走。
sentences.pinyin: Zài xiàyígè guǎijiǎo zuǒzhuǎn, ránhòu yán zhe hé àn wǎngqián zǒu.
sentences.en: "Turn left at the next corner and go straight along the riverside."

sentences.cn: 医院应该对这起医疗事故负全责。
sentences.pinyin: Yīyuàn yīnggāi duì zhè qǐ yīliáo shìgù fù quánzé.
sentences.en: "The hospital should take full responsibility for this medical accident."

sentences.cn: 公说公有理，婆说婆有理。
sentences.pinyin: Gōng shuō gōng yǒulǐ , pó shuō pó yǒulǐ.
sentences.en: "There is much to be said on both sides."

sentences.cn: 他酒后驾车，被交警罚款了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā jiǔhòu jiàchē , bèi jiāojǐng fákuǎn le .
sentences.en: He was fined for drunk-driving by traffic police.

sentences.cn: 打官司太麻烦，咱们私了吧。
sentences.pinyin: Dǎ guānsi tài máfan, zánmen sīliǎo ba.
sentences.en: "Since the law is too troublesome, let’s settle it privately."

sentences.cn: 他看见一条狗从隐蔽处窜出来。
sentences.pinyin: Tā kànjiàn yìtiáo gǒu cóng yǐnbìchù cuàn chūlái.
sentences.en: "He saw a dog run out from a hiding place."
"They have a big rivalry with us."

sentences.pinyin: Zuówǎn wǒ de chē bèi guā cèng le .
sentences.en: "My car was scratched last night."

sentences.cn: 我的新车被刮蹭了，真糟糕！
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de xīnchēbèi guā cèng le, zhēn zāogāo!
sentences.en: My new car got scratched. This is awful!

dialogue.cn: A : 你眼瞎了？没看见我这儿直行吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ yǎn xiāle? Méi kànjiàn wǒ zhè'er zhíxíng ma?
dialogue.en: Are you blind? Didn't you see me going straight?

dialogue.cn: B : 明明是你突然窜出来撞了我，你还有理了！
dialogue.pinyin: Míngmíng shì nǐ túrán cuàn chūlái zhuàngle wǒ, nǐ hái yǒulǐle!
dialogue.en: Obviously you sprang out suddenly and hit me, you're talking nonsense!

dialogue.cn: A : 不就是刮蹭吗？咱俩私了了吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Bù jiùshì guā cèng ma? Zán liǎ sīliǎole ba.
dialogue.en: No, that was a sideswipe. Let's settle it privately.

dialogue.cn: B : 没门儿，交警来之前你别想走，你这是全责。
dialogue.pinyin: Méimén er, jiāojǐng lái zhīqián nǐ bié xiǎng zǒu, nǐ zhè shì quán zé.
dialogue.en: No way, don't go anywhere before the traffic police arrive, it is your full responsibility.

dialogue.cn: A : 你这人较劲是不是啊？这儿有摄像头，谁的责任也跑不了。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ zhè rén jiàojìn shì bùshì a? Zhè'er yǒu shèxiàngtóu, shuí de zérèn yě pǎo bùliǎo.
dialogue.en: You're bluffing. There is a camera, you have to take responsibility too.

dialogue.cn: B : 我今天就跟你耗上了，开奥迪有什么了不起的！
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān jiù gēn nǐ hào shàngle, kāi àodí yǒu shé me liǎobùqǐ de!
dialogue.en: I'm not going anywhere! You think you're better because you drive an Audi?

dialogue.cn: A : 你这人简直是胡搅蛮缠。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ zhè rén jiǎnzhí shì hújiǎománchán.
dialogue.en: You're such an importunate person. Class 瞎 瞎 xiā blind adjective 直行 直行 zhíxíng go straight verb 全责 全責 quán zé full responsibility phrase 有理 有理 yǒulǐ reasonable adjective 交警 交警 jiāojǐng traffic police noun 私了 私了 sīliǎo private settlement; to settle privately noun/verb 窜 竄 cuàn to flee verb 较劲 較勁 jiàojìn to compete verb 刮蹭 刮蹭 guā cèng to scratch verb

dialogue.pinyin: A : 你眼瞎了？沒看見我這兒直行嗎？
B : 明明是你突然竄出來撞了我，你還有理了！
A : 不就是刮蹭嗎？咱倆私了了吧。
B : 沒門兒，交警來之前你別想走，你這是全責。
A : 你這人較勁是不是啊？這兒有攝像頭，誰的責任也跑不了。
B : 我今天就跟你耗上了，開奧迪有什麼了不起的！
A : 你這人簡直是胡攪蠻纏。

L5-013.lessonTitle: Chinese Insurance Might Not be a Sure Thing!

vocab.en: the five insurances plus the housing fund
to be in the red; to have a deficit

sentences.cn: 他从他父亲那里继承了一大笔财富。
sentences.pinyin: Tā cóng tā fùqīn nàlǐ jìchéng le yídàbǐ cáifù.
sentences.en: "He inherited a huge fortune from his father."

sentences.cn: 我们根据他的意见制定了新的计划。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen gēnjù tā de yìjiàn zhìdìng le xīn de jìhuà.
sentences.en: "We developed a new plan based on his idea."
I have to hand in the homework tomorrow.
(Let's) Send a text message.

sentences.cn: 中了彩票，他身上马上散发出了富翁的气息。
sentences.pinyin: zhòng le cǎipiào, tā shēnshàng mǎshàng sànfā chū le fùwēng de qìxī.
sentences.en: After winning the lottery, he immediately gave off the air of a millionaire.

sentences.cn: 股东按所持股票比例享受分红。
sentences.pinyin: Gǔdōng àn suǒ chí gǔpiào bǐlì xiǎngshòu fēnhóng.
sentences.en: "Shareholders receive a dividend in proportion to their shares held."
He is living on pensions.

sentences.cn: 关于住房贷款的新规定遭到了媒体的批评。
sentences.pinyin: Guānyú zhùfáng dàikuǎn de xīn guīdìng zāodào le méitǐ de pīpíng.
sentences.en: "The new provision for housing loans faces criticism from the media."

sentences.cn: 公司会为你缴纳五险一金。
sentences.pinyin: Gōngsī huì wèi nǐ jiǎonà wǔ xiǎn yì jīn .
sentences.en: The company will pay the five insurances and thehousing fund for you.
He gets paid at the end of the month.

sentences.cn: 你白上了四年大学，这点儿道理都不懂。
sentences.pinyin: nǐ bái shàng le sì nián dàxué, zhè diǎnr dàolǐ dōu bù dǒng.
sentences.en: You went to university in vain if you don't understand such a simple matter.
"He often puts his company into debt."

dialogue.cn: 经理，我能不交五险一金吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Jīnglǐ, wǒ néng bù jiāo wǔ xiǎn yī jīn ma?
dialogue.en: Manager, can I not pay for the five insurance payments?

dialogue.cn: 不行，这是国家规定的，必须交。公司还给你交一大部分呢。
dialogue.pinyin: Bùxíng, zhè shì guójiā guīdìng de, bìxū jiāo. Gōngsī hái gěi nǐ jiāo yī dà bùfèn ne.
dialogue.en: No, this is prescribed by law, you must pay. The company is paying a large part of it for you.

dialogue.cn: 我看新闻里说养老金现在就亏空一大笔钱，我怕等我老了，这些钱都白交了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ kàn xīnwén li shuō yǎnglǎo jīn xiànzài jiù kuīkong yī dà bǐ qián, wǒ pà děng wǒ lǎole, zhèxiē qián dōu bái jiāole.
dialogue.en: I saw the news saying that most of the pension funds are taken by embezzlement, I'm afraid that all my money will be gone by the time I retire.

dialogue.cn: 几十年以后的事谁也说不好。
dialogue.pinyin: Jǐ shí nián yǐhòu de shì shuí yě shuō bu hǎo.
dialogue.en: That's many years from now, we can't say for sure.

dialogue.pinyin: Nà wǒ néng shǎo jiāodiǎn er ma?
dialogue.en: Can I at least pay a bit less?

dialogue.cn: 不行，这都是根据你的工资按比例交的。要不公司少发你点儿工资？
dialogue.pinyin: Bùxíng, zhè dōu shì gēnjù nǐ de gōngzī àn bǐlì jiāo de. Yào bù gōngsī shǎo fā nǐ diǎn er gōngzī?
dialogue.en: No, this is calculated proportionately based on your salary. Unless you want a lower salary?

dialogue.cn: 算了，那还是按原来的交吧。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Suànle, nà háishì àn yuánlái de jiāo ba.
dialogue.en: Nevermind then, let's just do it the way it is.

dialogue.pinyin: 經理，我能不交五險一金嗎？
不行，這是國家規定的，必須交。公司還給你交一大部分呢。
我看新聞裡說養老金現在就虧空一大筆錢，我怕等我老了，這些錢都白交了。
幾十年以後的事誰也說不好。
不行，這都是根據你的工資按比例交的。要不公司少發你點兒工資？
算了，那還是按原來的交吧。

L5-015.lessonTitle: When is the Chinese Subway Not Crowded?

vocab.en: to rush into a situation; to be in time for

sentences.cn: 政府决定开通北京到天津的城际列车。
sentences.pinyin: Zhèngfǔ juédìng kāitōng Běijīng dào Tiānjīn de chéngjì lièchē.
sentences.en: "The government decided to open an intercity line between Beijing and Tianjin."
He takes the subway to work everyday.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuò dìtiě èrhào xiàn shàngbān.
sentences.en: "I take the Line 2 subway to go to work."

sentences.cn: 高速公路四通八达，非常方便。
sentences.en: "Superhighways radiate in all directions, they are very convenient. "
"Extra trains will run during the rush hour."

sentences.cn: 每到上下班高峰期，公交车上总是挤满了人。
sentences.pinyin: Měidào shàngxiàbān gāofēngqī, gōngjiāochē shàng zǒngshì jǐmǎn le rén.
sentences.en: "The bus is always crowded with commuters during the rush hour."

sentences.cn: 我们很幸运地赶上了晚饭。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen hěn xìngyùn de gǎnshàng le wǎnfàn.
sentences.en: "We were lucky to be in time for dinner."

sentences.pinyin: tā de tuìxiū shēnghuó hěn jīngcǎi . tā de tuìxiū shēnghuó hěn jīngcǎi .

sentences.en: "I plan to retire at fifty."

dialogue.cn: 听说北京又新开通了四条地铁线？
dialogue.pinyin: Tīng shuō běijīng yòu xīn kāitōngle sìtiáo dìtiě xiàn?
dialogue.en: I heard that the four new subway lines opened in Beijing?

dialogue.cn: 是啊，现在我都不怎么开车了，地铁四通八达，很方便。
dialogue.pinyin: Shì a, xiànzài wǒ dū bù zě me kāichēle, dìtiě sìtōngbādá, hěn fāngbiàn.
dialogue.en: Yeah, now I don't drive anymore. The subway goes everywhere, it's very convenient.

dialogue.cn: 我上次上下班高峰的时候坐了一回，快被挤晕了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ shàng cì shàng xiàbān gāofēng de shíhou zuòle yī huí, kuài bèi jǐ yūnle.
dialogue.en: Last time I rode the subway during rush hour, it was so crowded I almost fainted.

dialogue.cn: 那个时候可不能坐地铁，要是赶上那些换乘站更要命。
dialogue.pinyin: Nàgè shíhou kě bùnéng zuò dìtiě, yàoshi gǎn shàng nàxiē huàn chéng zhàn gèng yàomìng.
dialogue.en: Yes. You can't ride the subway around that time, it's even worse at the big transfer stations.

dialogue.pinyin: Nà shénme shíhou néng zuò a?
dialogue.en: Then when can I ride the subway?

dialogue.cn: 没人的时候坐呀，你看，我一般都是清晨六点坐地铁去香山，中午十二点回家，没人跟我挤。
dialogue.pinyin: Méi rén de shíhou zuò ya, nǐ kàn, wǒ yībān dōu shì qīngchén liù diǎn zuò dìtiě qù xiāngshān, zhōngwǔ shí'èr diǎn huí jiā, méi rén gēn wǒ jǐ.
dialogue.en: When nobody is riding it. Look, I take the subway to the Fragrant Hills at 6 o'clock in the morning, then go home around noon, it's not crowded at all.

dialogue.cn: 您是退休了，我还得天天上班呢。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Nín shì tuìxiūle, wǒ hái dé tiāntiān shàngbān ne.
dialogue.en: You are retired, but I have to go to work every day.

dialogue.pinyin: 聽說北京又新開通了四條地鐵線？
是啊，現在我都不怎麼開車了，地鐵四通八達，很方便。
我上次上下班高峰的時候坐了一回，快被擠暈了。
那個時候可不能坐地鐵，要是趕上那些換乘站更要命。
沒人的時候坐呀，你看，我一般都是清晨六點坐地鐵去香山，中午十二點回家，沒人跟我擠。
您是退休了，我還得天天上班呢。

L5-017.lessonTitle: Crossing a Chinese City Street is a Challenge!

sentences.cn: 想到家里只有我一个人就怪害怕的。
sentences.pinyin: Xiǎng dào jiālǐ zhǐyǒu wǒ yí gè rén jiù guài hàipà
sentences.en: de . I'm a little scared to think I am alone at home.
He ran harum-scarum all over the place.
Watch out for cars when you cross the road.

sentences.cn: 虽然交规上说开车时要给行人让道，可在马路上几乎没有人这么做。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán jiāoguīshàng shuō kāichē shí yào gěi xíngrén ràng dào, kě zài mǎlù shàng jīhū méiyǒu rén zhème zuò.
sentences.en: pedestrians, but almost no one does that.

sentences.pinyin: Fēng hěn dà, lùshang xíngrén hěn shǎo.
sentences.en: on the street.

sentences.cn: 不走人行横道横穿马路就是不守交通规则。
sentences.pinyin: Bù zǒu rénxínghéngdào héngchuān mǎlù jiùshì bùshǒu jiāotōng guīzé .
sentences.en: Those who do not cross at the crosswalk are "jaywalkers."
Don't follow me!

sentences.cn: 交警指示车辆停下以便让行人过街。
sentences.pinyin: Jiāojǐng zhǐshì chēliàng tíng xià yǐbiàn ràng xíngrén guò jiē .
sentences.en: pedestrians to cross the street.
You have to slow down your car at the crossroads.
Turn right at the intersection.

sentences.cn: 请在下一个红绿灯处左转。
sentences.pinyin: Qǐng zài xiàyígè hónglǜdēng chù zuǒzhuǎn .
sentences.en: Please turn left at the next traffic light.

dialogue.cn: 喂，你快来帮帮我，我过不去马路了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wèi, nǐ kuài lái bāng bāng wǒ, wǒ guòbuqù mǎlùle.
dialogue.en: Hey, come help me, I can't cross the road.

dialogue.pinyin: Zěnme huí shì? Nǐ zài nǎ'er ne?
dialogue.en: What happened? Where are you?

dialogue.cn: 我在人行横道这边，一直在等红绿灯，怎么也过不了街。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ zài rénxínghéngdào zhè biān, yīzhí zài děng hónglǜdēng, zěnme yěguò bu le jiē.
dialogue.en: I am at the crosswalk, I've been waiting for the traffic light to turn green, but I just can't cross.

dialogue.cn: 你跟着人流走啊，有人过你就过。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ gēn zhù rén liú zǒu a, yǒurénguò nǐ jiùguò.
dialogue.en: Just follow the crowd, cross when others are crossing.

dialogue.cn: 可是他们都不看红绿灯啊。
dialogue.pinyin: Kěshì tāmen dōu bù kàn hónglǜdēng a.
dialogue.en: But they don't care about the green light.

dialogue.cn: 看什么红绿灯，没车了就过。
dialogue.pinyin: Kàn shénme hónglǜdēng, méi chēle jiùguò.
dialogue.en: Forget about the traffic lights, just cross when there is no car.

dialogue.cn: 好多车都堵在十字路口了，它们也不让行人，能动的时候就横冲直撞的，我太害怕了。
dialogue.pinyin: Hǎoduō chē dōu dǔ zài shízìlù kǒule, tāmen yě bù ràng xíngrén, néngdòng de shíhou jiù héngchōngzhízhuàng de, wǒ tài hàipàle.
dialogue.en: There're a lot of cars at the intersection, and they don't let the pedestrians cross, just start driving whenever, I am too scared.

dialogue.cn: 那... 你往右边走十分钟，有一个过街天桥。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Nà... Nǐ wǎng yòubiān zǒu shí fēnzhōng, yǒu yīgè guòjiētiānqiáo.
dialogue.en: Then...walk ten minutes to the right, there is an overhead crossing bridge.

dialogue.pinyin: 喂，你快來幫幫我，我過不去馬路了。
我在人行橫道這邊，一直在等紅綠燈，怎麼也過不了街。
你跟著人流走啊，有人過你就過。
可是他們都不看紅綠燈啊。
看什麼紅綠燈，沒車了就過。
好多車都堵在十字路口了，它們也不讓行人，能動的時候就橫衝直撞的，我太害怕了。
那... 你往右邊走十分鐘，有一個過街天橋。

dialogue.cn: 朋友结婚，我随份子应该随多少钱啊？
dialogue.pinyin: Péngyǒu jiéhūn, wǒ suí fènzi yīnggāi suí duō shǎo qián a?
dialogue.en: My friend is getting married, how much should I give as the gift money?

dialogue.cn: 看你们关系的亲密程度了，要是好朋友随六百吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Kàn nǐmen guānxì de qīnmì chéngdùle, yàoshi hǎo péngyǒu suí liùbǎi ba.
dialogue.en: Depending how close you are, if it's a good friend then 600.

dialogue.cn: 我应该放在红包里，婚礼现场给她？
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yīnggāi fàng zài hóngbāo li, hūnlǐ xiànchǎng gěi tā?
dialogue.en: Should I put it in a red packet and give it to her on the wedding?

dialogue.cn: 对，别忘了在红包背面写上你的名字。有的是签到时给，有的是敬酒时给。到时看情况。
dialogue.pinyin: Duì, bié wàngle zài hóngbāo bèimiàn xiě shàng nǐ de míngzì. Yǒudeshì qiāndào shígěi, yǒudeshì jìngjiǔ shígěi. Dào shí kàn qíngkuàng.
dialogue.en: Yes, and don't forget to put your name on the back of the red packet. Some people give it at the entrance, some during the toasts. You can decide when you get there.

dialogue.cn: 太谢谢了，我第一次参加婚礼，这些礼节都不懂。
dialogue.pinyin: Tài xièxièle, wǒ dì yī cì cānjiā hūnlǐ, zhèxiē lǐjié dōu bù dǒng.
dialogue.en: Thank you so much, it is my first time attending a wedding, and I know nothing about this etiquette.

dialogue.cn: 没事，你看别人怎么做，你就怎么做。不会丢人的。
dialogue.pinyin: Méishì, nǐ kàn biérén zěnme zuò, nǐ jiù zěnme zuò. Bù huì diūrén de.
dialogue.en: No problem, just see how others do it then follow. You will not act like a fool. Everyone agreed.

sentences.en: He doesn’t want to go to the party, we’d better not go either.

sentences.cn: 选择自由行的话，你得提前自行安排食宿。

sentences.cn: 他没事就在网上看游戏攻略。

sentences.cn: 这部电影很俗，没有一点品位。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng hěn sú , méiyǒu yìdiǎn pǐnwèi.
sentences.en: This movie is vulgar and tasteless.

dialogue.cn: 亲爱的，我们去马尔代夫度蜜月怎么样？
dialogue.pinyin: Qīn'ài de, wǒmen qù mǎ'ěrdàifu dù mìyuè zěnme yàng?
dialogue.en: Dear, what do you think of going to the Maldives for a honeymoon?

dialogue.cn: 太俗了，人人都去那儿。不如，我们去个没什么游客的地方？
dialogue.pinyin: Tài súle, rén rén dōu qù nà'er. Bùrú, wǒmen qù gè méishénme yóukè dì dìfāng?
dialogue.en: That is too common, everyone goes there. How about we go somewhere with fewer tourists?

dialogue.cn: 塞舌尔怎么样？也有清澈的海水，细腻的沙滩。
dialogue.pinyin: Sāi shé ěr zěnme yàng? Yěyǒu qīngchè dì hǎishuǐ, xìnì de shātān.
dialogue.en: How about the Seychelles? There are clear waters and fine sandy beaches there.

dialogue.cn: 就是它了！可是我们怎么去啊？跟团还是自由行？
dialogue.pinyin: Jiùshì tāle! Kěshì wǒmen zěnme qù a? Gēn tuán háishì zìyóu xíng?
dialogue.en: That's it! But how do we get there? With a tour or by ourselves?

dialogue.cn: 跟团多没意思，还是自由行吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Gēn tuán duō méiyìsi, háishì zìyóu xíng ba.
dialogue.en: Going with a tour is so boring, let's just go by ourselves.

dialogue.cn: 我怕人生地不熟的，语言也不通，再被人卖了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ pà rénshēng dì bù shú de, yǔyán yě bùtōng, zài bèi rén màile.
dialogue.en: I'm afraid that we're unfamiliar with it, and we can't speak, so we could be deceived.

dialogue.cn: 放心吧，包在你老公身上。我去查旅行攻略，保证给你一个完美的蜜月行。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Fàngxīn ba, bāo zài nǐ lǎogōng shēnshang. Wǒ qù chá lǚxíng gōnglüè, bǎozhèng gěi nǐ yīgè wánměi de mìyuè xíng.
dialogue.en: Don't worry, let me, your husband, do it. I'll check the travel guides and guarantee to give you a perfect honeymoon.

dialogue.pinyin: 親愛的，我們去馬爾代夫度蜜月怎麼樣？
太俗了，人人都去那兒。不如，我們去個沒什麼遊客的地方？
塞舌爾怎麼樣？也有清澈的海水，細膩的沙灘。
就是它了！可是我們怎麼去啊？跟團還是自由行？
跟團多沒意思，還是自由行吧。
我怕人生地不熟的，語言也不通，再被人賣了。
放心吧，包在你老公身上。我去查旅行攻略，保證給你一個完美的蜜月行。

dialogue.cn: A : 我们的网站适用于所有人，客户数量绝对有保障。
dialogue.pinyin: A : Wǒmen de wǎngzhàn shìyòng yú suǒyǒu rén, kèhù shùliàng juéduì yǒu bǎozhàng.
dialogue.en: A : Our site targets all people. The number of customers is absolutely secure.

dialogue.cn: B : 你们网站都有什么功能？能提供什么服务？
dialogue.pinyin: B : Nǐmen wǎngzhàn dōu yǒu shé me gōngnéng? Néng tígōng shénme fúwù?
dialogue.en: B : What kind of function does your website have? What kind of service does it provide?

dialogue.cn: A : 选车，购车，汽车保养，我们提供一条龙服务。想买车的，已经有车的，都需要我们的网站。
dialogue.pinyin: A : Xuǎn chē, gòuchē, qìchē bǎoyǎng, wǒmen tígōng yītiáo lóng fúwù. Xiǎng mǎi chē de, yǐjīng yǒu chē de, dōu xūyào wǒmen de wǎngzhàn.
dialogue.en: A : We offer a one-stop service, including car selection, purchase, and maintenance. Our website is useful for people who want to buy a car, as well as those who already have a car.

dialogue.cn: B : 这跟4S店有什么区别呀？
dialogue.pinyin: B : Zhè gēn 4S diàn yǒu shé me qūbié ya?
dialogue.en: B : Is there any difference between this and the 4S shops?

dialogue.cn: A : 有啊，我们是网站，他们是实体店呀。我们多方便快捷。
dialogue.pinyin: A : Yǒu a, wǒmen shì wǎngzhàn, tāmen shì shítǐ diàn ya. Wǒmen duō fāngbiàn kuàijié.
dialogue.en: A : Of course. We are a website. They are the actual store. We are more convenient.
B : That's true.

dialogue.cn: A : 所以您给我们投资是稳赚不赔的。
dialogue.pinyin: A : Suǒyǐ nín gěi wǒmen tóuzī shì wěn zhuàn bù péi de.
dialogue.en: A : So it is a sure win if you invest with us.

dialogue.cn: B : 给我看一下你们的网页。
dialogue.pinyin: B : Gěi wǒ kàn yīxià nǐmen de wǎngyè.
dialogue.en: B : Show me the website.

dialogue.cn: A : 哦.. 这个，还需要一个月，现在网站还在设计中。
dialogue.pinyin: A : Ó.. Zhège, hái xūyào yīgè yuè, xiànzài wǎngzhàn hái zài shèjì zhōng.
dialogue.en: A : Oh... the site is still being designed. It needs another month.
So...

dialogue.cn: 不过，您放心，投资我们绝对是正确的选择。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Bùguò, nín fàngxīn, tóuzī wǒmen juéduì shì zhèngquè de xuǎnzé.
dialogue.en: But don't you worry, investing in us is the absolute right choice.

dialogue.pinyin: A : 我們的網站適用於所有人，客戶數量絕對有保障。
B : 你們網站都有什麼功能？能提供什麼服務？
A : 選車，購車，汽車保養，我們提供一條龍服務。想買車的，已經有車的，都需要我們的網站。
B : 這跟4S店有什麼區別呀？
A : 有啊，我們是網站，他們是實體店呀。我們多方便快捷。
A : 所以您給我們投資是穩賺不賠的。
B : 給我看一下你們的網頁。
A : 哦... 這個，還需要一個月，現在網站還在設計中。
不過，您放心，投資我們絕對是正確的選擇。

dialogue.cn: 部长先生，请问关于最近中国大范围持续的雾霾天气，政府准备出台什么措施进行治理？
dialogue.pinyin: Bùzhǎng xiānshēng, qǐngwèn guānyú zuìjìn zhōngguó dà fànwéi chíxù de wù mái tiānqì, zhèngfǔ zhǔnbèi chūtái shénme cuòshī jìnxíng zhìlǐ?
dialogue.en: Mr. Minister, what is the government's action on the recent large-scale haze condition?

dialogue.cn: 我们准备出台相关规定减少居民路边烧烤和燃放鞭炮。关注空气质量，大家人人有责嘛。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒmen zhǔnbèi chūtái xiāngguān guīdìng jiǎnshǎo jūmín lù biān shāokǎo hé ránfàng biānpào. Guānzhù kōngqì zhí liàng, dàjiā rén rén yǒu zé ma.
dialogue.en: We are going to introduce relevant provisions to reduce residents doing roadside barbecues and setting off firecrackers. We’re concerned about air quality, and it’s everyone’s responsibility.

dialogue.cn: 听说空气污染问题和私家车使用的汽油质量有关系，您同意这种说法吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Tīng shuō kōngqì wūrǎn wèntí hé sījiā chē shǐyòng de qìyóu zhìliàng yǒu guānxì, nín tóngyì zhè zhǒng shuōfǎ ma?
dialogue.en: It has been said that the air pollution problems are caused by the quality of gasoline, do you agree with this?

dialogue.cn: 对，所以我们鼓励百姓乘坐公共交通出行，减少使用私家车。
dialogue.pinyin: Duì, suǒyǐ wǒmen gǔlì bǎixìng chéngzuò gōnggòng jiāotōng chūxíng, jiǎnshǎo shǐyòng sījiā chē.
dialogue.en: Yes, so we encourage people to use public transportation and reduce the use of cars.

dialogue.cn: 我的意思是说，我国的空气污染问题是否和汽油质量不合格有关？
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ de yìsi shì shuō, wǒguó de kōngqì wūrǎn wèntí shìfǒu hé qìyóu zhìliàng bù hégé yǒuguān?
dialogue.en: What I mean is, are China's air pollution problems and substandard quality of gasoline related?

dialogue.cn: 这个问题我们尚不清楚，有待研究，我没法回答。下一个问题。 Traditional
dialogue.pinyin: Zhège wèntí wǒmen shàng bù qīngchu, yǒudài yánjiū, wǒ méi fǎ huídá. Xià yīgè wèntí.
dialogue.en: We're not sure. We’ll look into it, so no comment. Next question.

dialogue.pinyin: 部长先生，請問關於最近中國大範圍持續的霧霾天氣，政府準備出台什麼措施進行治理？
我們準備出台相關規定減少居民路邊燒烤和燃放鞭炮。關注空氣質量，大家人人有責嘛。
聽說空氣污染問題和私家車使用的汽油質量有關係，您同意這種說法嗎？
對，所以我們鼓勵百姓乘坐公共交通出行，減少使用私家車。
我的意思是說，我國的空氣污染問題是否和汽油質量不合格有關？
這個問題我們尚不清楚，有待研究，我沒法回答。下一個問題。

sentences.pinyin: pà shénme, zhǐbùguò shì zhī xióng.

STUDENT: Then what if...

dialogue.pinyin: SHĪFU: kuài! zhǐ bùguò shì tiáo xiǎoyú!

sentences.cn: 听说，她和她老公离婚了。
sentences.pinyin: tīngshuō, tā hé tā lǎogōng líhūn le.

sentences.pinyin: tā lǎopo hé tā chǎojià le, ránhòu jiù hé tā líhūn
sentences.en: le. His wife fought with him and then divorced him.

sentences.pinyin: líhūn yǐhòu, tā yīzhí yī gè rén shēnghuó.

dialogue.en: I want to divorce my husband.
Why?

dialogue.cn: 甲: 结婚之前他总是带我去吃烛光晚餐，去看电影，还给我 做饭洗碗。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǍ: jiéhūn zhīqián tā zǒngshì dài wǒ qù chī zhúguāng wǎncān, qù kàn diànyǐng, háigěi wǒ zuòfàn xǐwǎn.
dialogue.en: Before we married, he would always take me out for candlelight dinners, then out to watch a movie, cook me food, and clean the dishes.
And now?

dialogue.cn: 甲: 现在他什么都不给我买，也不做家务！还搞外遇！
dialogue.pinyin: JIǍ: xiànzài tā shénme dōu bù gěi wǒ mǎi, yě bù zuò jiāwù! hái gǎo wàiyù!
dialogue.en: Now, he doesn't buy me anything, won't do anything around the house, and he's having an affair.
It's that bad?

dialogue.cn: 甲: 这些都无所谓。还有更糟的。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǍ: zhèxiē dōu wúsuǒwèi. hái yǒu gèng zāo de.
dialogue.en: All these things don't really matter. There's something worse.

dialogue.cn: 乙: 他和外遇有孩子了？
dialogue.pinyin: YǏ: tā hé wàiyù yǒu háizi le?
dialogue.en: He had a child with his mistress?

dialogue.cn: 甲: 不！他不让我搞外遇。
dialogue.pinyin: JIǍ: bù! tā bù ràng wǒ gǎo wàiyù.
dialogue.en: No, he won't let me have an affair.

sentences.cn: 根据他们的传统，结婚之后才是成年人。
sentences.pinyin: gēnjù tāmen de chuántǒng, jiéhūn zhīhòu cái shì chéngniánren.

sentences.pinyin: xiànzài tài wǎn le, wǒ děi zǒu le.

No problem. What? - GETTING MARRIED IN CHINA

No problem.

Uh...okay.

Let's break up.

Isn't that right? I totally agree.
Everything has already passed.

Your skin is pretty good!

dialogue.pinyin: duì a, suǒyǒu rén dōu shuō tā zhǎng de hěn jīngzhì.

They don't count as big.

That's enough...

L5-036.lessonTitle: How to Get Rich Quick in China

sentences.pinyin: jīnnián guónèi de jīngjì hěn hǎo.
sentences.en: The domestic economy is very good this year.

sentences.cn: 经济萧条的时候，工作很难找。
sentences.pinyin: jīngjì xiāotiáo de shíhòu, gōngzuò hěn nán zhǎo.
sentences.en: It's hard to find work in an economic recession.
There's too much risk investing in stocks.

sentences.cn: 我觉得投资基金风险比较小。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ juéde tóuzī jījīn fēngxiǎn bǐjiào xiǎo.
sentences.en: I feel there is comparatively little risk investing in market funds.

sentences.cn: 只有高风险，才有高回报。
sentences.pinyin: zhǐyǒu gāo fēngxiǎn, cái yǒu gāo huíbào.
sentences.en: You can only get a high return with high risk.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ yǐjīng chǎo le sānnián gǔ le.
sentences.en: I've speculated in the stock market for three years.
very high.
The price of houses has appreciated again.

sentences.cn: 今年我们公司的收入翻倍了。
sentences.pinyin: jīnnián wǒmen gōngsī de shōurù fānbèi le.
sentences.en: Our company revenues doubled this year.

dialogue.cn: 经济萧条，你说做什么可以又轻松又赚钱呢？
dialogue.pinyin: jīngjì xiāotiáo, nǐ shuō zuò shénme kěyǐ yòu qīngsōng yòu zhuànqián ne?
dialogue.en: With the economy like this, you know what you can do that's profitable and not too taxing?

dialogue.cn: 天下哪儿有免费的午餐啊？
dialogue.pinyin: tiānxià nǎr yǒu miǎnfèi de wǔcān a?
dialogue.en: There's no such thing as a free lunch.
Invest!

dialogue.cn: 风险和回报是成正比的。股票债券，都是高回报，高风险。
dialogue.pinyin: fēngxiǎn hé huíbào shì chéng zhèngbǐ de. gǔpiàozhàiquàn, dōu shì gāo huíbào, gāo fēngxiǎn.
dialogue.en: Risk and return are related. Stocks and bonds are both high-risk, high return investments.

dialogue.cn: 那都过时了。现在流行炒房地产。
dialogue.pinyin: Nà dōu guòshí le. xiànzài liúxíng chǎo fángdìchǎn.
dialogue.en: That's old-fashioned. Speculating with real estate is what's popular now.
Isn't that the truth. My uncle spent a million last month buying a house. It's already doubled in value this month.

dialogue.cn: 可不是吗，我舅舅上个月花一百万买了一栋房子，这个月就涨了一倍！
dialogue.pinyin: kěbushì ma, wǒ jiùjiu shàng ge yuè huā yībǎiwàn mǎi le yī dòng fángzi, zhègè yuè jiù zhǎng le yī bèi!
dialogue.en: So you're getting ready to buy housing?

dialogue.pinyin: nà nǐ yě zhǔnbèi mǎi fáng qù ?
dialogue.en: Of course! After the price doubles a few times, I'll quickly get richer than Bill Gates.

dialogue.cn: 当然了！到时候，房价翻倍再翻倍，我很快就成比尔盖茨啦！
dialogue.pinyin: dāngrán le! dào shíhou, fángjià fānbèi zài fānbèi, wǒ hěn kuài jiù chéng Bǐ'ěr Gàicí la!

sentences.pinyin: běijīng de dìtiě lǐ yǒu ānjiǎn.
sentences.en: The Beijing subway has security checks.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ dài zhe gǒu shàng le huǒchē.
sentences.en: He carried a dog onto the train.

sentences.cn: 这不过是一件小事儿罢了。
sentences.pinyin: zhè bùguò shì yījiàn xiǎoshìr bàle.
sentences.en: This is only something small, that's all.

sentences.cn: 我只不过迟到了一会儿罢了。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ zhǐbùguò chídào le yīhuìr bàle.
sentences.en: I was only a bit late, that's all.

sentences.cn: 这些土制的药方都不科学。
sentences.pinyin: zhèxiē tǔzhì de yàofāng dōu bù kēxué.
sentences.en: These local prescriptions are not scientific.
A few bombs were found in the vicinity.
accident here.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ zuótiān qù le sān tàng yīyuàn.
sentences.en: I went to the hospital three times yesterday.

dialogue.cn: 先生，打火机不能带上飞机。
dialogue.pinyin: xiānsheng, dǎhuǒjī bù néng dài shàng fēijī.
dialogue.en: Sir, you can't take lighters onto the plane.

dialogue.cn: 为什么？不过是个打火机罢了。
dialogue.pinyin: wèishénme? bùguò shì ge dǎhuǒjī bà le.
dialogue.en: Why? It's only a lighter.
This is also unacceptable.
Kitchen knives aren't okay?

dialogue.pinyin: hái yǒu zhè shì shénme? bōluó ma?
dialogue.en: And what's this? A pineapple?
Just a homemade bomb.

dialogue.cn: 看来我们需要到警察局一趟。
dialogue.pinyin: kànlái wǒmen xūyào dào jǐngchájú yī tàng.
dialogue.en: It seems we need to go see the police.
I don't want to go!

dialogue.cn: 怕什么？不过是聊聊罢了。
dialogue.pinyin: pà shénme? bùguò shì liáoliao bà le.
dialogue.en: What are you afraid of? It's just a chat, that's all.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ de diànzǐ yóuxiāng bèi dào le.
sentences.en: My e-mail box was broken into.

sentences.cn: 如果你的银行账户被盗了，你该怎么办？
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ de yínháng zhànghù bèi dào le, nǐ gāi zěnme bàn?
sentences.en: What should you do if your bank account is broken into?

sentences.cn: 我刚刚改了自己的银行密码。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ gānggāng gǎi le zìjǐ de yínháng mìmǎ.
sentences.en: I just changed my bank password.

sentences.cn: 我的提示问题是：你的宠物叫什么名字？
sentences.pinyin: wǒ de tíshì wèntí shì: nǐ de chǒngwù jiào shénme míngzi?
sentences.en: My security question is "What is the name of your pet?"

sentences.cn: 我输入了三遍密码，都不对。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ shūrù le sān biàn mìmǎ, dōu bù duì.
sentences.en: I entered the password three times; none were right.

sentences.cn: 这不是我的问题，是系统的问题。
sentences.pinyin: zhè bù shì wǒ de wèntí, shì xìtǒng de wèntí.
sentences.en: problem.

sentences.cn: 因为你的判断有误，我损失了很多钱。
sentences.pinyin: yīnwèi nǐ depànduàn yǒu wù, wǒ sǔnshī le hěn duō qián.
sentences.en: I lost a lot of money because of your error in judgment.

dialogue.cn: 老婆，我的电子邮箱被盗了！
dialogue.pinyin: lǎopo, wǒ de diànzǐ yóuxiāng bèi dào le!
dialogue.en: Honey, my e-mail account has been hacked!

dialogue.pinyin: nà nǐ kuài gǎi mìmǎ ya!
dialogue.en: Then change the password quickly!

dialogue.cn: 但是我忘了提示问题的答案了。
dialogue.pinyin: dànshì wǒ wàng le tíshì wèntí de dáàn le.
dialogue.en: But I forgot the answer to my security question.

dialogue.pinyin: nǐ de tíshì wèntí shì shénme?
dialogue.en: What was your security question?

dialogue.pinyin: wǒ zuì ài de rén shì shéi.
dialogue.en: Who is the person I love the most.
It's me!
