dialogue.en: You be reasonable. There's no-one's name written on this seat.
Can't you be civilized?

dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ tuī wǒ? Nǐ gǎn dòngshǒu?
dialogue.en: Did you push me? You dare hit me?

dialogue.cn: 谁推你了。是你挡着我的手了。
dialogue.pinyin: Shéi tuī nǐ le. Shì nǐ dǎngzhe wǒ de shǒu le.
dialogue.en: No-one hit you. You bumped into my arm.
Police! I want to call the police!

vocab.en: to go to cram school verb

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zuì hǎo zǎo diǎnr bàomíng.
sentences.en: You'd better go and register early.

sentences.cn: 一般情况下，这是不行的。
sentences.pinyin: Yībān qíngkuàng xià, zhè shì bù xíng de.
sentences.en: Normally this is not allowed.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhōumò yǒu shénme ānpái ma?
sentences.en: This weekend do you have any plans?

sentences.cn: 赶快来试试一对一的中文课程吧！
sentences.pinyin: Gǎnkuài lái shìshi yīduìyī de zhōngwén kèchéng
sentences.en: ba! Come try out the one-on-one Chinese learning program!

sentences.cn: 我们这儿的老师都是外教。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen zhèr de lǎoshī dōu shì wàijiào.
sentences.en: Our teachers are all foreign teachers.

sentences.cn: 一对一的外教授课对语言学习很有帮助。
sentences.pinyin: Yīduìyī de wàijiào shòukè duì yǔyánxué xí hěn yǒu bāngzhù.
sentences.en: teachers is very helpful for learning languages.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de Zhōngwén xūyào bǔ bǔkè.
sentences.en: I need to go to cram school for Chinese.

sentences.cn: 你看过芭蕾舞的“天鹅湖”吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ kàn guo bālěiwǔ de "tiān é hú" ma?
sentences.en: Have you seen the ballet Swan Lake?

sentences.cn: 有外教授课的补习班儿都满了。
sentences.pinyin: Yǒu wàijiào shòukè de bǔxíbān ér dōu mǎnle.
sentences.en: The cram classes with native teachers are all full.

dialogue.cn: 我要给我们家孩子报名学日语。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yào gěi wǒmen jiā háizi bàomíng xué rìyǔ.
dialogue.en: I want to enroll my child to study Japanese.

dialogue.cn: 他！年龄这么小，我们一般是不收的。
dialogue.pinyin: Tā! Niánlíng zhème xiǎo, wǒmen yībānshì bùshōu de.
dialogue.en: Him! He's so young, we don't normally take kids this young.
You won't take him? I have plenty of money!

dialogue.cn: 嗯。。。这个我们看看能不能安排。
dialogue.pinyin: En... zhège wǒmen kànkan néngbùnéng ānpái.
dialogue.en: Uh...let's see if we can arrange something.

dialogue.cn: 我要给他报你们这儿最高级的班，要一对一，全外教授课的。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yào gěi tā bào nǐmen zhèr zuì gāo jí de bān, yào yīduìyī, quán wàijiào shòukè de.
dialogue.en: I want him in your highest class. One on one, with only foreign teachers.
Can he come on the weekend?

dialogue.pinyin: Zhōumò bù xíng. Zhōumò yào bǔkè.
dialogue.en: Absolute not. He's in cram school on weekends.
His time is so full?

dialogue.cn: 周一篮球，周二芭蕾舞，周三。。。我看就周三晚上吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhōuyī lánqiú, zhōuèrbālěiwǔ, zhōusān... wǒ kàn jiù zhōusān wǎnshang ba.
dialogue.en: Basketball on Monday, ballet on Tuesdays, Wednesdays...I think Wednesday evening is okay.

sentences.cn: 这架飞机的乘客已经全满了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jià fēijī de chéngkè yǐjīng quán mǎnle.
sentences.en: This flight is full of passengers.

sentences.cn: 由于故障问题，飞机无法起飞。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú gùzhàng wèntí, fēijī wúfǎ qǐfēi.
sentences.en: technical malfunction.

sentences.cn: 通知说会议将会延迟举行。
sentences.pinyin: Tōngzhī shuō huìyì jiāng huì yánchí jǔxíng.
sentences.en: The announcement said the conference will be postponed.

sentences.cn: 候机大厅里的乘客越来越多。
sentences.pinyin: Hòu jī dàtīng lǐ de chéngkè yuèláiyuèduō.
sentences.en: There are more and more passengers in the departure lounge.
Why is it always me who is the unlucky one?

sentences.cn: 这趟航班被延迟起飞了，具体起飞时间要听通知。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè tàng hángbān bèi yánchí qǐfēi le, jùtǐ qǐfēishíjiān yào tīng tōngzhī.
sentences.en: departure times, listen to the announcement.

sentences.cn: 国航的飞机一般都会准时起飞。
sentences.pinyin: Guóháng de fēijī yībān dōuhuì zhǔnshí qǐfēi.
sentences.en: take off on time.

sentences.cn: 飞机因为天气大雾暂时不能起飞。
sentences.pinyin: Fēijī yīnwèi tiānqì dàwù zànshí bù néng qǐfēi.
sentences.en: because of the fog.

dialogue.en: Attention passengers...attention passengers...

dialogue.cn: 真倒霉，就没有一次不晚点的！
dialogue.pinyin: Zhēn dǎoméi, jiù méiyǒu yī cì bù wǎndiǎn de!
dialogue.en: Oh, how unlucky! There is not a single time it's not late.

dialogue.cn: 您乘坐的国航CA9507次飞往阿拉斯加的航班因飞机故障要延迟起飞。
dialogue.pinyin: Nín chéngzuò de guóháng CAjiǔqiān wǔbǎi qī cì fēiwǎng ālāsījiā de hángbān yīn fēijī gùzhàng yào yánchí qǐfēi.
dialogue.en: Your flight CA9507 to Alaska will be delayed because of the mechanical difficulties.

dialogue.cn: 我就知道会这样。上次是大雾，这次又是飞机故障。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ jiù zhīdào huì zhèyàng. Shàng cì shì dàwù, zhècì yòu shì fēijīgùzhàng.
dialogue.en: I knew it would be like this. Last time it was fog. This time it's a mechanical problems again.

dialogue.cn: 请您在候机大厅休息，等候通知。
dialogue.pinyin: Qǐng nín zài hòu jī dàtīng xiūxi, děnghòu tōngzhī.
dialogue.en: Please rest at the airport departure lounge and wait for further notice.

dialogue.cn: 我以后再也不坐国航了！
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ yǐhòu zài yě bù zuò guóháng le!
dialogue.en: This is the last time I am flying Air China.

L5-054.lessonTitle: All You Need is Love in China

vocab.en: to wash verb - ALL YOU NEED IS LOVE IN CHINA

sentences.cn: 用这个锅之前要好好刷一下。
sentences.pinyin: Yòng zhège guō zhīqián yào hǎohāo shuā yīxià.
sentences.en: Give this pot a good wash before using it.

sentences.cn: 早上喝点儿麦片粥又方便又有营养。
sentences.pinyin: Zǎoshang hē diǎnr màipiànzhōu yòu fāngbiàn yòu yǒu yíngyǎng.
sentences.en: Eating oat porridge in the morning is both convenient and nutritional.

sentences.cn: 我喝粥的时候最喜欢加些蜂蜜了。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ hē zhōu de shíhou zuì xǐhuan jiā xiē fēngmì le.
sentences.en: I like adding honey when eating porridge.

sentences.cn: 往馄饨汤里加点儿虾米皮和紫菜就更好吃了。
sentences.pinyin: Wǎng húntún tāng lǐ jiādiǎnr xiāmipí hé zǐcài jiù gèng hǎochī le.
sentences.en: Adding some dried shrimp and dried seaweeds will make the wonton soup even more tasty. -

sentences.cn: 老北京人喜欢早上吃油条。
sentences.pinyin: Lǎo Běijīng rén xǐhuān zǎoshang chī yóutiáo.
sentences.en: dough sticks in the morning.

sentences.cn: 有时侯早上我嫌麻烦就不吃东西了。
sentences.pinyin: Yǒushí hóu zǎoshang wǒ xián máfan jiù bù chī dōngxi le.
sentences.en: anything in the morning.

sentences.cn: 豆汁儿是绿豆发酵以后做成的。
sentences.pinyin: Dòuzhī ér shì lǜ dòu fājiào yǐhòu zuòchéngde.
sentences.en: Mung bean juice is made from fermented mung bean.

dialogue.cn: A 老婆，咱们早点吃什么呀？
dialogue.pinyin: A Lǎopo, zánmen zǎo diǎn chī shénme yā?
dialogue.en: Honey, what shall we eat for breakfast?
How about oat porridge?

dialogue.cn: A 可是咱们的锅都是脏的，已经好几天没刷了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Kěshì zánmen de guō dōu shì zāng de, yǐjīng hǎo jǐ tiān méi shuāle.
dialogue.en: But all the pots are dirty. They haven't been washed for days.

dialogue.pinyin: B Nà jiù hē niúnǎi ba.
dialogue.en: Then how about some milk?

dialogue.cn: A 可牛奶早就喝光了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Kě niúnǎi zǎojiùhē guāng le.
dialogue.en: But we finished the milk ages ago.

dialogue.cn: B 你昨晚不是要去买的吗？
dialogue.pinyin: B Nǐ zuówǎn bù shì yào qù mǎi de ma?
dialogue.en: Weren't you gonna go buy some last night?

dialogue.cn: A 是，可我发现咱们一点儿现金都没有了。取钱的话，还得走出咱们小 区。我嫌太远了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Shì, kě wǒ fāxiàn zánmen yīdiǎnr xiànjīn dōu méiyǒu le. Qǔ qián de huà, hái děi zǒu chū zánmen xiǎoqū. Wǒ xián tài yuǎn le. -
dialogue.en: Yeah, but I discovered we're out of cash. I'd have to walk out of our compound to get more. It's too far.

dialogue.cn: B 那就喝白开水吧，再加点儿蜂蜜，味道应该也不错。
dialogue.pinyin: B Nà jiù hē báikāishuǐ ba, zài jiā diǎnr fēngmì, wèidao yīnggāi yě bùcuò.
dialogue.en: Then let's drink boiled water. We can add some honey. It should taste alright.

dialogue.cn: A 太有创意了。宝贝儿，我爱你。
dialogue.pinyin: A Tài yǒu chuàngyì le. Bǎobèir, wǒ ài nǐ.
dialogue.en: You are so creative. Baby, I love you.

sentences.cn: 都过了这么长时间了，他们还没有答复。
sentences.pinyin: Dōu guò le zhèmecháng shíjiān le, tāmen hái méiyǒu dáfù.
sentences.en: It's been so long and they still haven't replied.

sentences.cn: 这次实在是不好意思，我下次一定注意。
sentences.pinyin: Zhècì shízài shì bùhǎoyìsi, wǒ xiàcì yīdìng zhùyì.
sentences.en: I'm really sorry about this time and will pay attention next time.

sentences.cn: 这个社会根本不存在什么公平竞争。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège shèhuì gēnběn bùcúnzài shénme gōngpíngjìngzhēng.
sentences.en: In this society there is no such thing as fair competition.

sentences.cn: 那家公司通知我去试工。
sentences.pinyin: Nà jiā gōngsī tōngzhī wǒ qù shì gōng.
sentences.en: trial work.

sentences.cn: 他每月的薪水太低，实在租不起这么贵的房子。
sentences.pinyin: Tā měi yuè de xīnshuǐ tài dī, shízài zū bù qǐ zhème guì de fángzi.
sentences.en: His monthly salary is so low he really can't afford such an expensive rental.

sentences.cn: 在这家公司上班连电脑都要自备，更别提午餐了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī shàngbān lián diànnǎo dōu yào zì bèi, gèng bié tí wǔcān le.
sentences.en: In this company you have to bring your own computer, to say nothing of lunch.

sentences.cn: 你已经应聘了这么多家公司，到底有没有结果？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǐjīng yìngpìn le zhème duō jiā gōngsī, dàodǐ yǒu méiyǒu jiéguǒ?
sentences.en: without any result?

sentences.cn: 我的轮胎坏了，车子不走了。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de lúntāi huàile, chēzi bù zǒule.
sentences.en: My tire is broken, the car doesn't go.
tire

sentences.cn: 应聘空姐要经过五轮儿面试。
sentences.pinyin: Yìngpìn kōngjiě yào jīngguò wǔ lúnér miànshì.
sentences.en: to go through five interviews. -

sentences.cn: 能来参加这次节目，我太荣幸了。
sentences.pinyin: Néng lái cānjiā zhècì jiémù, wǒ tài róngxìng le.
sentences.en: I am so honored to be able to attend the program.

dialogue.cn: A 谢谢你参加我们公司的面试。
dialogue.pinyin: A  xièxie nǐ cānjiā wǒmen gōngsī de miànshì.
dialogue.en: Thank you for attending our company's interview.

dialogue.cn: B 这是我的荣幸。请问什么时候能给我答复呢？
dialogue.pinyin: B  zhè shì wǒ de róngxìng. qǐngwèn shénme shíhòu néng gěi wǒ dáfù ne?
dialogue.en: It's my honor. May I ask when will I get a reply?

dialogue.cn: A 是这样，因为应聘这个职位的人实在太多了，我们想给大家一个公平竞 争的机会。
dialogue.pinyin: A  shì zhèyàng, yīnwèi yìngpìn zhège zhíwèi de rén shízài tàiduō le, wǒmen xiǎng gěi dàjiā yī ge gōngpíngjìngzhēng de jīhuì.
dialogue.en: It's this way. Because there are really too many people applying for this job, but we want to give everyone a fair opportunity to compete.
Of course.

dialogue.cn: A 所以我们决定选出一百名通过第一轮面试的人，参加第二轮试工。
dialogue.pinyin: A suǒyǐ wǒmen juédìng xuǎn chū yībǎi míng tōngguò dì yī lún miànshì de rén, cānjiā dìèrlún shìgōng. -
dialogue.en: So we decided to pick out a hundred of those who passed the first round of the interview to do an internship of sorts.

dialogue.cn: B 没问题，请问我什么时候可以来？
dialogue.pinyin: B  méiwèntí, qǐngwèn wǒ shénme shíhòu kěyǐ lái?
dialogue.en: No problem. When can I come?

dialogue.cn: A 嗯...你可以...下个月，不，下下个月的第二个星期一来。
dialogue.pinyin: A en ...nǐ kěyǐ ...xià ge yuè, bù, xià xià ge yuè de dì èr ge xīngqīyī lái.
dialogue.en: Hmm...you can...come next month, oh no, the month after next month on the second Monday.
What... - A GRUELLING CHINESE INTERVIEW

dialogue.cn: A 另外还有，试工期为一个月，没有薪水，午餐自备。
dialogue.pinyin: A lìngwài hái yǒu, shìgōngqī wéi yī ge yuè, méiyǒu xīnshuǐ, wǔcān zì bèi.
dialogue.en: There is one more thing. The trial runs for a month without pay and you have to pay for your own lunch.

L5-057.lessonTitle: The Hundredth Time's the Charm in China

vocab.en: lottery ticket noun - THE HUNDREDTH TIME'S THE CHARM IN CHINA
to draw the winning numbers verb

sentences.cn: 没有中奖的彩票就是废纸一张。
sentences.pinyin: Méiyǒu zhòngjiǎng de cǎipiào jiùshì fèizhǐ yīzhāng.
sentences.en: A lottery ticket without the right number is just a piece of rubbish.

sentences.cn: 他买了十年的彩票，却从来都没中过奖。
sentences.pinyin: Tā mǎi le shí nián de cǎipiào, què cónglái dōu méi zhòngguo jiǎng.
sentences.en: He's been buying lottery tickets for 10 years, but has never won.

sentences.pinyin: Zhècì tā zhēn péi le bùshǎo qián.
sentences.en: This time he really lost a lot of money.

sentences.cn: 每次开奖之前是我最紧张的时候。
sentences.pinyin: Měicì kāi jiǎng zhīqián shì wǒ zuì jǐnzhāng de shíhou.
sentences.en: I'm the most nervous just before the announcement of the winning ticket. - THE HUNDREDTH TIME'S THE CHARM IN CHINA
Your sense of prescience is amazing!

sentences.cn: 他预感挺灵的，没准儿这次你真能中个大奖。
sentences.pinyin: Tā yùgǎn tǐng líng de, méi zhǔn ér zhècì nǐ zhēn néng zhòng ge dàjiǎng.
sentences.en: He's got a really good sense of things, so maybe this time you'll really win the big prize.

sentences.cn: 没想到我中了个头等奖，差点儿把它当废纸扔了。
sentences.pinyin: Méi xiǎngdào wǒ zhòng le ge tóu děng jiǎng, chàdiǎnr bǎ tā dāng fèizhǐ rēngle.
sentences.en: I never thought I could win first prize, and almost threw out the ticket as rubbish.

sentences.cn: 据说这次比赛的大奖是一辆豪华跑车。
sentences.pinyin: Jùshuō zhècì bǐsài de dàjiǎng shì yī liàng háohuápǎochē.
sentences.en: It's said the prize for this competition is a luxury sports car.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè jù huà wǒ dū tīng nìle.
sentences.en: I'm tired of hearing the sentence so much.

sentences.cn: 小姑娘在纸上涂满了各种颜色的星星。
sentences.pinyin: Xiǎo gūniang zài zhǐshàng túmǎn le gèzhǒng yánsè de xīngxing.
sentences.en: the paper.

dialogue.cn: 你看见我买的彩票了吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ kànjiàn wǒ mǎi de cǎipiào le ma?
dialogue.en: Did you see my lottery ticket?
No.

dialogue.cn: 我明明就放在窗台儿上了。一张黄色的，涂满黑圈儿的 纸？
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ míngmíng jiù fàngzài chuāngtáiér shàng le. Yī zhāng huángsè de, túmǎn hēiquānr de zhǐ?
dialogue.en: I clearly left it by the window. A piece of yellow paper covered with black circles?

dialogue.cn: 没注意。可能是在收拾屋子的时候，当废纸给扔了。
dialogue.pinyin: Mi zhùyì. Kěnéng shì zài shōushi wūzi de shíhou, dāng fèizhǐ gěi rēngle.
dialogue.en: I didn't notice it. It could have been there when I was tidying up the room, I threw it out as a piece of rubbish.

dialogue.cn: 什么？废纸？万一要中了，头等奖可是500万！
dialogue.pinyin: Shénme? Fèizhǐ? Wànyī yào zhòng le, tóuděngjiǎng kěshì wǔbǎiwàn!
dialogue.en: What? A piece of rubbish? What if I won? The first prize is five million!

dialogue.cn: 你还敢提。这么多年，你赔了多少钱？连个末等奖也没 中过呀。
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ hái gǎn tí. Zhème duō nián, nǐ péi le duō shǎo qián? Lián ge mòděngjiǎng yě méi zhòngguò yā.
dialogue.en: You dare to mention it. How much money have you lost over the years? You've never even won the smallest prize.

dialogue.cn: 没准儿就是这次了。我有预感。
dialogue.pinyin: Méizhǔnr jiùshì zhècì le. Wǒ yǒu yùgǎn. -
dialogue.en: This could be the time. I have a feeling.

dialogue.cn: 这话我都听腻了。你去垃圾桶里找找吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhè huà wǒ dōu tīngnìle. Nǐ qù lājītǒng lǐ zhǎozhao ba.
dialogue.en: I've heard too much of this. Why don't you go and look for it in the trash can.

L5-058.lessonTitle: Is the Honeymoon Over in China?

vocab.en: to wander around verb - IS THE HONEYMOON OVER IN CHINA?
to be solely engaged in something verb
to go to the restaurant verb
to have no interest in someone expression

sentences.cn: 我平常不大出门，只是偶尔去逛逛街。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ píngcháng bù dà chūmén, zhǐ shì ǒuěr qù guàngguang jiē.
sentences.en: occasionally I go window shopping.

sentences.cn: 婚后的生活对她来说是无聊透顶。
sentences.pinyin: Hūnhòude shēnghuó duì tā láishuō shì wúliáo tòu dǐng.
sentences.en: extremely boring.

sentences.cn: 他连这点儿工夫都没有吗？
sentences.pinyin: Tlián zhè diǎnr gōngfu dōu méiyǒu ma?
sentences.en: He didn't even have a bit of time for this?

sentences.cn: 她是个不幸的女人，丈夫很早就离开了她。
sentences.pinyin: Tā shì ge bùxìng de nǚrén, zhàngfu hěn zǎo jiù líkāi le tā. She is very unlucky that her husband left
sentences.en: her long ago. - IS THE HONEYMOON OVER IN CHINA?

sentences.cn: 我来的时候，你净顾着玩儿牌了。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ lái de shíhou, nǐ jìng gù zhe wánr pái le.
sentences.en: When I came in, you were busy playing cards.

sentences.cn: 这小两口虽然挣得不多，却天天下馆子。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè xiǎo liǎng kǒu suīrán zhēng de bùduō, què tiāntiān xià guǎn zi.
sentences.en: much money, they eat out every day.

sentences.cn: 他经常对我爱答不理的，我都习惯了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā jīngcháng duì wǒ ài dá bù lǐ de, wǒ dōu xíguàn le.
sentences.en: He often ignores me. I'm already used to it.

dialogue.en: How was Spring Festival this year?

dialogue.cn: 别提了。除了吃，就是睡。偶尔再上上网，无聊透顶。
dialogue.pinyin: Bié tí le. Chúle chī, jiùshì shuì, ǒuěr zài shàngshangwǎng, wúliáo tòu dǐng.
dialogue.en: Not worth mentioning. If I wasn't eating, I was sleeping. And sometimes I'd go online. It was so boring.
Didn't you get out to do anything?

dialogue.cn: 我老公就顾着打麻将，哪有工夫陪我？
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ lǎogōng jiù gùzhe dǎ májiàng, nǎyǒu gōngfu péi wǒ?
dialogue.en: My husband only wanted to play Mahjong. Where has he got time for me?

dialogue.cn: 我男朋友带我去欧洲旅行了，可有意思了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ nánpéngyou dài wǒ qù ōuzhōu lǚxíng le, kě yǒu yìsi le.
dialogue.en: My boyfriend took me to Europe. It was so much fun.
Yeah?

dialogue.cn: 我们每天喝喝咖啡，吹吹海风，下下馆子。我觉得幸福 死了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒmen měitiān hēhē kāfēi, chuīchuī hǎifēng, xiàxià guǎnzǐ. Wǒ juéde xìngfú sǐ le. -
dialogue.en: Everyday we would drink coffee, enjoy the sea breeze, and go to restaurants. I felt so happy.

dialogue.cn: 等着吧。我老公结婚之前也挺浪漫。结完婚就爱答不理 了。
dialogue.pinyin: Děngzhe ba. Wǒ lǎogōng jiéhūn zhīqián yě tǐng làngmàn. Jié wán hūn jiù àidábùlǐ le.
dialogue.en: Wait and see. Before I got married, my husband was pretty romantic too. Then after marriage he lost interest in me.

vocab.en: to give for free verb - THE CHINESE GOLD RUSH

sentences.cn: 这些天黄金升值太快了，连白银都跟着涨了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè xiē tiān huángjīn shēngzhí tài kuài le, lián báiyín dōu gēnzhe zhǎng le.
sentences.en: lately that even the price of silver is rising.

sentences.cn: 最近大家都在抢着买黄金。
sentences.pinyin: Zuìjìn dàjiā dōu zài qiǎngzhe mǎi huángjīn.
sentences.en: gold.

sentences.cn: 看来生活水平是提高了，白给的东西都不要了。
sentences.pinyin: Kànlái shēnghuó shuǐpíng shì tígāo le, bái gěi de dōngxi dōu bùyào le.
sentences.en: It looks like the standard of living has indeed increased if people no longer want free stuff.

sentences.cn: 质量这么差的东西白给我也不要。
sentences.pinyin: Zhìliàng zhème chà de dōngxi bái gěi wǒ yě bù yào.
sentences.en: I wouldn't want something this bad even if it was free. -

sentences.cn: 我只是个普通老百姓，没见过这种场面。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ shì ge pǔtōng lǎobǎixìng, méi jiànguo zhèzhǒng chǎngmiàn.
sentences.en: I am only an ordinary person, and have never seen anything like this.

sentences.cn: 这么贵的金项链儿，让我瞅瞅。
sentences.pinyin: Zhème guì de jīn xiàngliànér, ràng wǒ chǒuchǒu.
sentences.en: let me take a look.

sentences.cn: 这种场面平常是不多见的。
sentences.pinyin: Zhèzhǒng chǎngmiàn píngcháng shì bù duō jiàn
sentences.en: de. This kind of situation is not often seen.

sentences.cn: 老百姓的生活越来越富裕了。
sentences.pinyin: Lǎobǎixìng de shēnghuó yuèláiyuè fùyù le.
sentences.en: geting wealthier and wealthier.

sentences.cn: 你是不是发财了？买这么贵的首饰?
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ shìbùshì fācái le? Mǎi zhème guì de shǒushì?
sentences.en: Have you made a fortune, buying such expensive jewlery?

dialogue.cn: 这么多人在买黄金，也太夸张了吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhème duō rén zài mǎi huángjīn, yě tài kuāzhāng le ba.
dialogue.en: So many people are buying gold. This is way too much.

dialogue.cn: 这还叫多？周末再来瞅瞅。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhè hái jiào duō? Zhōumò zàilái chǒuchǒu.
dialogue.en: This is too much? Come back to have a look on the weekend.
It looks like people buying cabbage.

dialogue.cn: 这两年黄金升值太快，而且还越炒越高。谁都怕错过发财机会。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhèliǎngnián huángjīn shēngzhí tài kuài, érqiě hái yuè chǎo yuè gao. Shéi dōu pà cuòguò fācái jīhuì.
dialogue.en: These last few years the value of gold has gone up quickly and it's getting higher all the time. No-one wants to miss this opportunity to make a fortune.

dialogue.cn: 那我也没见过这场面呀，跟白给不要钱似的。
dialogue.pinyin: Nà wǒ yě méi jiànguo zhè chǎngmiàn yā, gēn báigěi bù yào qián Shìde.
dialogue.en: Yet I haven't seen anything like this. It looks like they are being given out for free.

dialogue.cn: 谁让咱老百姓的生活水平提高了呢，咱不缺钱！
dialogue.pinyin: Shéi ràng zán lǎobǎixìng de shēnghuó shuǐpíng tígāo le ne, zán bù quē qián!
dialogue.en: Thanks to the fact the standard of living of the ordinary people has increased, we're not short of money.

dialogue.cn: 这么说你也送我点儿什么吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhème shuō nǐ yě sòng wǒ diǎnr shénme ba.
dialogue.en: If that's the case then why don't you buy me something?

dialogue.cn: 呃，这...可是还有一小部分像我这样没有富裕起来的群众呢。
dialogue.pinyin: E, zhè ...kěshì hái yǒu yìxiǎobùfen xiàng wǒ zhèyàng méiyǒu fùyù qǐlai de qúnzhòng ne.
dialogue.en: Well... there are still a couple of people like me who haven't gotten rich yet.

L5-061.lessonTitle: The Downside of Faking an Injury in China

vocab.en: to have a snowball fight verb

sentences.cn: 滑雪是我最喜欢的运动了。
sentences.pinyin: Huáxuě shì wǒ zuì xǐhuān de yùndòng le.

sentences.en: le. Don't mention it. It broke after I played with it for just five minutes.

sentences.cn: 他刚滑了半小时，就把腰闪了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā gāng huá le bànxiǎoshí, jiù bǎ yāo shǎn le.
sentences.en: He hurt his back after only half an hour of skiing.

sentences.cn: 你尽量早点儿来，别让大家都等你。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ jǐnliàng zǎo diǎnr lái, bié ràng dàjiā dōu děng nǐ.
sentences.en: everyone wait for you.

sentences.cn: 可惜你把腰闪了，不然你就能跟我们一块儿去了。
sentences.pinyin: Kěxī nǐ bǎ yāo shǎn le, bùrán nǐ jiù néng gēn wǒmen yīkuàier qù le.
sentences.en: It's a pity that you've hurt your back, otherwise you could have gone with us.

sentences.cn: 我记得小时候一下完雪，我们就跑出去堆雪人。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jìde xiǎo shíhou yī xià wán xuě, wǒmen jiù pǎo chūqù duī xuěrén.
sentences.en: I remember that we'd run outside to build a snowman whenever it snowed when we were young.

sentences.cn: 可惜你不在，不然你就能和我们一起打雪仗了。
sentences.pinyin: Kěxī nǐ bù zài, bùrán nǐ jiù néng hé wǒmen yīqǐ dǎxuězhàng le.
sentences.en: It's a pity you're not here or you could have joined us for a snowball fight.

dialogue.cn: B 真的？太好了，咱们明天去滑雪吧。
A 好呀，再叫上小张他们一块儿去。
B 好主意。咱们先出去铲雪吧，我看他们都在大门口呢。
A 啊，这样啊...别提了，我昨天刚把腰闪了，正疼着呢。
A 好像不轻，医生说要尽量少活动。
B 那太可惜了，我看明天你也别去滑雪了，在家好好休息吧。

dialogue.pinyin: B Wǒ jiā xīn gù de bǎomǔ.

dialogue.cn: A 长得真漂亮，跟章子怡似的。

dialogue.en: She is really pretty, and looks like Zhang Ziyi.

dialogue.pinyin: B Tā nǎrdōuhǎo, kě jiù yǒu yīyàngr.

to come out on the market

dialogue.pinyin: A Qǐngwèn nǐmen zhè shì zài páiduì mǎi shénme ne?

dialogue.en: B The iPhone 5. Tomorrow is the global release date.

dialogue.cn: A 什么？ IPhone5 都要上市了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Shénme? IPhonewǔ dōu yào shàngshì le.

dialogue.pinyin: B Shì ya, jùshuō IPhonewǔ shì quán tòumíng de, érqiě hái yǒu fángshuǐgōngnéng.

dialogue.cn: A 那也用不着今天就来排队吧？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nā yě yòngbuzháo jīntiān jiù lái páiduì ba?

dialogue.cn: B 当然要，这我都不知道能不能买上呢。
dialogue.pinyin: B Dāngrán yào, zhè wǒ dōu bù zhīdào néngbùnéng mǎi shàng ne.
dialogue.en: B Of course there's a use. Although, I'm not sure I'll be able to buy it.

dialogue.pinyin: A Nā yào pái yī wǎnshang ba?

dialogue.cn: B 小意思，上次我排队买Iphone4的时候是冬天，我排了一宿差点儿没冻 死。
dialogue.pinyin: B Xiǎoyìsi, shàng cì wǒ páiduì mǎi Iphone sì de shíhou shì dōngtiān, wǒ pái le yī xiǔ chàdiǎnr méi dòngsǐ.
dialogue.en: B This will be a piece of cake. When I lined up for the iPhone 4 last time, it was winter and I nearly froze to death.

sentences.cn: 你整天这么愁眉苦脸的也不是办法呀。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhěngtiān zhème chóuméikǔliǎn de yě bù shì bànfǎ ya.

sentences.cn: 他们两口子感情很好，从不吵架。
sentences.pinyin: Tāmen liǎngkǒuzi gǎnqíng hěn hǎo, cóngbù chǎojià.

sentences.cn: 我怎么做他都看我不顺眼。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zěnme zuò tā dōu kàn wǒ bùshùnyǎn.
sentences.en: me.

sentences.pinyin: Tā jiāo wǒ xué zhōngwén, wǒ jiāo tā xué rìyǔ, wǒmen liǎ hùxiāng bāngzhù.

sentences.cn: 干脆把它掰下来，换个新的得了。
sentences.pinyin: Gāncuì bǎ tā bāixiàlai, huàn ge xīn de dé le.
sentences.en: Just break it off and exchange it for a new one.

sentences.cn: 我马上就走，省的你看我不顺眼。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ mǎshàng jiù zǒu, shěng de nǐ kàn wǒ bùshùnyǎn.
sentences.en: I am leaving soon so you won't have to deal with me.

sentences.cn: 邻居们都夸他是个孝顺的孩子。

sentences.cn: 不要为了一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事吵架，太不值得。
sentences.pinyin: Bùyào wèile yīxiē jī máo suàn pí de xiǎoshì chǎojià, tài bùzhíde.
sentences.en: Don't quarrel over trivial things; it's not worth it.

dialogue.cn: A 怎么啦？愁眉苦脸的。

dialogue.cn: B 哎，还不是我妈和我媳妇。
dialogue.pinyin: B āi, hái bù shì wǒmā hé wǒ xífu.

They are fighting again?

dialogue.cn: B 天天吵，我都快受不了了。
dialogue.pinyin: B Tiāntiān chǎo, wǒ dōu kuài shòu buliǎo le.

So why are they fighting anyway?

dialogue.cn: B 一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事。就是互相看着不顺眼呗。
dialogue.pinyin: B Yīxiē jīmáosuànpí de xiǎoshì. Jiùshì hùxiāng kànzhe bùshùnyǎn bei. -

dialogue.cn: A 干脆别跟你妈住一块儿了，搬出去得了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Gāncuì bié gēn nǐmā zhù yīkuàier le, bānchūqù dé le.

dialogue.en: But who will cook for us?

dialogue.cn: A 那就跟你媳妇离，省的她老和你妈吵。 10. B 那谁给我生儿子呀？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nà jiù gēn nǐ xífu lí, shěng de tā lǎo hé nǐmā chǎo. 10. B Nà Shéigěi wǒ shēng érzi ya?

sentences.cn: 由于她的心细避免了不必要的损失。

The green tea here is really authentic.

sentences.cn: 朋友们都听说他很大方。
sentences.pinyin: Péngyǒumen dōu tīng shuō tā hěn dàfāng.
sentences.en: His friends have all heard he's very generous.

sentences.cn: 他看我不顺眼，我还瞧不起他呢。
sentences.pinyin: Tā kàn wǒ bùshùnyǎn, wǒ hái qiáobuqǐ tā ne.
sentences.en: He doesn't like the way I am and I look down on him too.

sentences.cn: 你这么大的嗓门会把邻居吵醒的。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhème dà de sǎngmén huì bǎ línjū chǎo xǐng
sentences.en: de. If you talk so loudly, you'll wake the neighbors.

sentences.cn: 随地吐痰是一种十分没有修养的表现。
sentences.pinyin: Suídì tǔtán shì yī zhǒng shífēn méiyǒu xiūyǎng de biǎoxiàn.
sentences.en: Spitting on the street is very uncultured behaviour.

dialogue.cn: A 听说那个新来的同事是河南人。
dialogue.pinyin: A Tīngshuō nà ge xīnláide tóngshì shì Hénánrén.
dialogue.en: I hear that new colleague is from Henan.
Maybe, I'm not sure.

dialogue.cn: A 我最不喜欢河南人了。又不讲卫生，人又土。
dialogue.pinyin: A Wǒ zuì bù xǐhuān Hénánrén le. Yòu bù jiǎngwèishēng, rén yòu tǔ. -
dialogue.en: People from Henan are my least favorite people. They are neither hygienic nor fashionable.
What about people from Dongbei?

dialogue.cn: B 也好不到哪去，说话办事都太糙。
dialogue.pinyin: A Yě hǎo bù dào nǎ qù, shuōhuà bànshì dōu tài cāo.
dialogue.en: They are not much better off. The way they talk and behave is too rough.
People from Shanghai pay attention to details. - VOICING SOME STRONG CHINESE OPINIONS

dialogue.cn: B 也太细了。尤其是上海女人，太会算计了。还谁都瞧不起。
dialogue.pinyin: A Yě tài xì le. Yóuqí shì shànghǎi nǚrén, tài huì suàn jì le. Hái shéi dōu qiáobuqǐ.
dialogue.en: They are too detailed. Especially Shanghai women, they are too calculating. And they look down on everyone.
What about people from Guangdong?

dialogue.cn: B 别提了。说话嗓门大得像是在吵架，没修养！ 10. A 那依你觉得哪儿的人最好？ 11. B 我看也就我们北京人最地道。
dialogue.pinyin: A Bié tí le. Shuōhuà sǎngmén dà děi xiàng shì zài chǎojià, méi xiūyǎng! 10. B Nā yī nǐ juéde nǎr de rén zuìhǎo? 11. A Wǒ kàn yě jiù wǒmen běijīngrén zuì dìdào.
dialogue.en: Don't mention them. When they talk, it's just like they are having a fight. They are so uncultured. 10. B: So in your opinion who are the best people? 11. A: I think our Beijing people are the best.

L5-072.lessonTitle: Deciding on the Perfect Wedding Gift in China

vocab.en: to wrap a red bag verb

sentences.cn: 看样子你最近是手头儿宽裕了，天天在外面吃饭。
sentences.pinyin: Kàn yàngzi nǐ zuìjìn shì shǒu tóuer kuān yù le, tiāntiān zài wàimiàn chīfàn.
sentences.en: Looks like you've got quite a bit of spare money these days, dining out everyday.

sentences.cn: 他们的婚礼设在一个五星级酒店，并且请了上百人参加。
sentences.pinyin: Tāmen de hūnlǐ shèzài yīge wǔxīngjí jiǔdiàn, bìngqiě qǐng le shàngbǎi rén cānjiā.
sentences.en: Their wedding was held in a five-star hotel with over a hundred guests in attendance.

sentences.cn: 去参加婚礼，哪有不包个红包的？
sentences.pinyin: Qù cānjiā hūnlǐ, nǎyǒu bù bāo ge hóngbāo de?
sentences.en: Don't you prepare a red bag before going to weddings?

sentences.cn: 这送礼和还礼的道理大家都明白。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè sònglǐ hé huán lǐ de dàolǐ dàjiā dōu míngbai.
sentences.en: buying gifts and returning favors. -

sentences.cn: 包个这么小的红包实在有点儿拿不出手。
sentences.pinyin: Bāo ge zhèmexiǎo de hóngbāo shízài yǒudiǎnér nábùchūshǒu.
sentences.en: It's really a bit embarrassing to wrap such a small red bag.
There is no such thing as a free lunch.

sentences.cn: 凭这张名片，他就不敢拦我。
sentences.pinyin: Píng zhè zhāng míngpiàn, tā jiù bù gǎn lán wǒ.
sentences.en: stop me.

sentences.cn: 好朋友过生日，手头儿再紧也要意思意思。
sentences.pinyin: Hǎopéngyou guò shēngrì, shǒu tóuer zài jǐn yě yào yìsi yìsi.
sentences.en: When a good friend has a birthday, you have to get something even if you're short for cash.

dialogue.cn: A 你去参加小张的婚礼吗？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nǐ qù cānjiā xiǎo zhāng de hūnlǐ ma?
dialogue.en: Are you going to attend Xiao Zhang's wedding?

dialogue.cn: B 还没想好到底去不去。
dialogue.pinyin: B Hái méi xiǎng hǎo dàodǐ qù bu qù.
dialogue.en: I'm still not sure whether I should go.

dialogue.cn: A 不是收到请柬了吗？
dialogue.pinyin: A Bù shì shōudào qǐngjiǎn le ma?
dialogue.en: Haven't you already received an invitation?

dialogue.cn: B 没错。可我最近手头有点儿紧。总不能空着手去参加人家婚礼吧？
dialogue.pinyin: B Méicuò. Kě wǒ zuìjìn shǒu tóu yǒu diǎnr jǐn. Zǒngbùnéng kōngzheshǒu qù cānjiā rénjiā hūnlǐ ba?
dialogue.en: Sure, but I've been a bit short of cash, and I can't go and attend someone's wedding empty-handed.

dialogue.cn: A 随便包个红包不就得了。
dialogue.pinyin: A Suíbiàn bāo ge hóngbāo bù jiù dé le.
dialogue.en: Just give him a red bag. It should be fine.

dialogue.cn: B 凭我和小张的关系，钱少了拿不出手，钱多了我又有点儿舍不得。
dialogue.pinyin: B Píng wǒ hé xiǎo zhāng de guānxi, qián shǎo le ná bùchūshǒu, qián duō le wǒ yòu yǒudiǎn ér shěbùdé.
dialogue.en: Given my relationship with Xiao Zhang, giving too little would be embarrassing, and I can't afford to give too much.

dialogue.cn: A 可你就是不去，也得送份礼意思意思呀。
dialogue.pinyin: A Kě nǐ jiùshì bù qù, yě děi sòng fèn lǐ yìsi yìsi ya. -
dialogue.en: But even if you don't go, don't you still have to send some sort of wedding gift?

dialogue.cn: B 也是。去了还能白吃一顿。
dialogue.pinyin: B Yě shì. Qù le hái néng báichī yī dùn.
dialogue.en: You are right. At least I can enjoy a free meal if I go.

dialogue.cn: A 再说了，将来等你结婚的时候，他不是还得还礼？
dialogue.pinyin: A Zàishuōle, jiānglái děng nǐ jiéhūn de shíhou, tā bù shì hái děi huán lǐ?
dialogue.en: And when you get married in the future, doesn't he have to return the favor?

vocab.en: to go on a business trip
to run errands verb - MUST LOVE DOGS IN CHINA
to go on a blind date

sentences.cn: 盗版盘虽然比原版盘便宜多了，但质量也差了不少。
sentences.pinyin: Dàobǎn pán suīrán bǐ yuánbǎn pán piányi duō le, dàn zhìliàng yě chā le bùshǎo.
sentences.en: Although the pirated discs are much cheaper than the original ones, the quality is a lot worse too.

sentences.cn: 他让他的管家带着他的爱犬去公园散步。
sentences.pinyin: Tā ràng tā de guǎnjiā dài zhè tā de ài quǎn qù gōngyuán sànbù.
sentences.en: He asked his housekeeper to take his dog for a walk in the park.

sentences.cn: 这个工作有30%的时间是在出差.
sentences.pinyin: zhège gōngzuò yǒu bǎifēn zhī sānshí de shíjiān shì zài chūchāi .
sentences.en: For this job, thirty percent of the time is spent on business trips.

sentences.cn: 我前两天在上海出差的时候遇到了大学时的老同学。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ qiánliǎngtiān zài Shànghǎi chūchāi de shíhou yùdào le dàxué shí de lǎo tóngxué.
sentences.en: I saw an old classmate from university a few days ago when I was in Shanghai on business.

sentences.cn: 我的爱犬这两天不太舒服，我要在家照顾照顾它。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de àiquǎn zhè liǎng tiān bútài shūfu, wǒ yào zàijiā zhàogù zhàogù tā.
sentences.en: My dog hasn't been feeling well recently and I need to stay at home to care for it.

sentences.cn: 他告诉管家用餐的时间推迟了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā gàosu guǎnjiā yòng cān de shíjiān tuīchíle.
sentences.en: He told the housekeeper the meal time had been delayed. -

sentences.pinyin: Néngbùnéng gěi wǒ pǎo ge tuǐ ér?
sentences.en: Can you run an errand for me?

sentences.cn: 他的公司很小，手下也就几个人。
sentences.pinyin: Tā de gōngsī hěn xiǎo, shǒuxià yě jiù jǐ gè rén.
sentences.en: few staff.

sentences.cn: 相亲的时候，他一眼就看上了她。
sentences.pinyin: Xiāngqīn de shíhou, tā yīyǎn jiù kànshàngle tā.
sentences.en: He fell in love with her instantly on their blind date.

dialogue.cn: A 你平时有什么爱好？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nǐ píngshí yǒu shénme àihào?
dialogue.en: Do you have any hobbies?

dialogue.cn: B 我喜欢打高尔夫，看些英文原版的电影，大部分时间还是去世界各地旅 行。
dialogue.pinyin: B Wǒ xǐhuān dǎ gāoěrfū, kàn xiē yīngwén yuánbǎn de diànyǐng, dàbùfēn shíjiān hái shì qù shìjiè gèdì lǚxíng.
dialogue.en: I like to play golf, watch English movies and spend most of my time traveling around the world.

dialogue.cn: A 那你会不会因为工作的关系经常出差呢？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nà nǐ huìbuhuì yīnwèi gōngzuò de guānxi jīngcháng chūchāi ne?
dialogue.en: So do you need to travel much for business then?

dialogue.cn: B 不会，这些跑腿儿的事儿一般都是手下去做的。
dialogue.pinyin: B Bùhuì, zhè xiē pǎotuir de shìr yībān dōu shì shǒuxià qù zuò de.
dialogue.en: No, these kinds of errands are usually done by my staff.

dialogue.cn: A 那你一直是一个人生活的吗？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nà nǐ yīzhí shì yīgerén shēnghuó de ma?
dialogue.en: So have you always lived alone?

dialogue.cn: B 噢不，家里有个管家和两个保姆照顾我。
dialogue.pinyin: B o bù, jiālǐ yǒu ge guǎnjiā hé liǎngge bǎomǔ zhàogu wǒ.
dialogue.en: Oh no, I have a housekeeper and two housemaids to look after me.

dialogue.cn: A 那为什么不找个女朋友呢？
dialogue.pinyin: A Nà wèishénme bù zhǎo ge nǚpéngyou ne?
dialogue.en: Why don't you find a girlfriend then?

dialogue.cn: B 哦，因为我认识的那些女人都不愿意每天和我的五只爱犬一起用餐。
dialogue.pinyin: B ò, yīnwèi wǒ rènshi de nàxiē nǚrén dōu bùyuànyì měitiān hé wǒde wǔzhǐ àiquǎn yīqǐ yòngcān.
dialogue.en: Oh, because none of the women I know want to eat together with me and my dogs.

L5-075.lessonTitle: Sticking to a Diet is Tough in China

vocab.en: to carry out verb - STICKING TO A DIET IS TOUGH IN CHINA

sentences.cn: 为了实施这个计划，他准备了好长时间。
sentences.pinyin: Wéile shíshī zhège jìhuà, tā zhǔnbèi le hǎo cháng shíjiān.
sentences.en: out this plan.

sentences.cn: 他在全家人面前宣布他决定要结婚了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā zài quánjiā rén miànqián xuānbù tā juédìng yào jiéhūn le.
sentences.en: front of his entire family.

sentences.cn: 你只要每天花上半小时，做做简单的健身运动就行。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhǐyào měi tiān huāshàng bànxiǎoshí, zuòzuo jiǎndān de jiànshēn yùndòng jiù xíng.
sentences.en: some simple exercises.

sentences.cn: 他这个人什么都好，就是太啰嗦。
sentences.pinyin: Tā zhè ge rén shénme dōuhǎo, jiùshì tài luōsuo.
sentences.en: Everything about him is good, except he talks too much. -

sentences.cn: 他保证每天坚持锻炼半小时。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bǎozhèng měi tiān jiānchí duànliàn bànxiǎoshí.
sentences.en: He promised to exercise for half an hour everyday.

sentences.cn: 爸爸的突然去世对他的打击太大了。
sentences.pinyin: Bàba de tūrán qùshì duì tā de dǎjī tàidà le.
sentences.en: to him.

sentences.cn: 健康的饮食对身体有一定的好处。
sentences.pinyin: Jiànkāng de yǐnshí duì shēntǐ yǒu yīdìng de hǎochù.
sentences.en: A healthy diet is definitely beneficial to a healthy body.

sentences.cn: 像麦当劳和肯德基这样的快餐都叫垃圾食品。
sentences.pinyin: Xiàng màidāngláo hé kěndéjī zhèyàng de kuàicān dōu jiào lājī shípǐn.
sentences.en: Fast food from places like McDonald's and KFC are all considered junk food.

dialogue.cn: 我宣布从现在开始实施我的健身减肥计划。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ xuānbù cóng xiànzài kāishǐ shíshī wǒde jiànshēn jiǎnféi jìhuà.
dialogue.en: I'm announcing the start of my plan to get fit and lose weight now!

dialogue.cn: 我都听你说了不下十遍了。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ dōu tīng nǐ shuō le bùxià shíbiàn le.
dialogue.en: I've heard you say this more than ten times.

dialogue.cn: 这次我绝对是认真的。我所有的裤子都穿不下了，太受打击了。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhècì wǒ juéduì shì rènzhēn de. Wǒ suǒyǒu de kùzi dōu chuānbuxià le, tài shòu dǎjī le.
dialogue.en: This time I'm really serious. None of my trousers fit me any more. It is such a blow.

dialogue.cn: 不光是锻炼，你还要注意饮食，少吃垃圾食品。
dialogue.pinyin: Bùguāng shì duànliàn, nǐ hái yào zhùyì yǐnshí, shǎochī lājī shípǐn.
dialogue.en: Don't just do exercise. You also need to pay attention to what you eat. Try to avoid junk food.

dialogue.cn: 知道了，别啰嗦了，咱们去吃点儿东西吧。
dialogue.pinyin: Zhīdao le, bié luōsuo le, zánmen qù chīdiǎnr dōngxi ba.
dialogue.en: I know. Stop going on about it. Let's go and get something to eat.

dialogue.pinyin: Hǎo, nǐ xiǎng chī diǎnr shénme?
dialogue.en: Ok, what would you like to eat?

dialogue.cn: 肯德基怎么样？我听说他们新推出了一款果酱鱼汉堡。
dialogue.pinyin: Kěndéjī zěnmeyàng? Wǒ tīngshuō tāmen xīntuīchū le yīkuǎn guǒjiàngyú hànbǎo.
dialogue.en: How about KFC? I hear they just started to advertise a new fish burger.

dialogue.cn: 你不是刚说过要减肥吗？
dialogue.pinyin: Nǐ bù shì gāng shuō guò yào jiǎnféi ma? -
dialogue.en: Didn't you just say you are going to lose some weight?

dialogue.cn: 我说的是从明天开始，我保证。
dialogue.pinyin: Wǒ shuō de shì cóng míngtiān kāishǐ, wǒ bǎozhèng.
dialogue.en: I said starting from tomorrow. I promise.
